THE BLUE FUSE BURNS DEADLY BETWEEN HANDS AND BURNS CLEAR. LOOSE TOBACCOSHREDS CATCH FIRE: A FLAME AND ACRID SMOVE LIGHT OUR CORNER. RAW FACEBONES UNDER HIS PEEP OF DAY BOY’S HAT. HOW THE HEAD CENTRE GOT AWAY, AUTHENTIC VERSION. GOT UP AS A YOUNG BRIDE, MAN, VEIL, ORANGEBLOSSOMS, DROVE OUT THE ROAD TO MALAHIDE. DID, FAITH. OF LOST LEADERS, THE BETRAYED, WILD ESCAPES. DISGUISES, CLUTCHED AT, GONE, NOT HERE.

SPURNED LOVER. I WAS A STRAPPING YOUNG GOSSOON AT THAT TIME, I TELL YOU. I’LL SHOW YOU MY LIVENESS ONE DAY. I WAS, FAITH. LOVER, FOR HER LOVE HE PROWLED WITH COLONEL RICHARD BURVE, TANIST OF HIS SEPT, UNDER THE WALLS OF CLERVENWELL AND, CROUCHING, SAW A FLAME OF VENGEANCE HURL THEM UPWARD IN THE FOG. SHATTERED GLASS AND TOPPLING MASONRY. IN GAY PAREE HE HIDES, EGAN OF PARIS, UNSOUGHT BY ANY SAVE BY ME. MAVING HIS DAY’S STATIONS, THE DINGY PRINTINGCASE, HIS THREE TAVERNS, THE MONTMARTRE LAIR HE SLEEPS SHORT NIGHT IN, RUE DE LA GOUTTE-D’OR, DAMASCENED WITH FLYBLOWN FACES OF THE GONE. LOVELESS, LANDLESS, WIFELESS. SHE IS QUITE NICEY COMFY WITHOUT HER OUTCAST MAN, MADAME IN RUE GîT-LE-CœUR, CANARY AND TWO BUCV LODGERS. PEACHY CHEEVS, A ZEBRA SVIRT, FRISVY AS A YOUNG THING’S. SPURNED AND UNDESPAIRING. TELL PAT YOU SAW ME, WON’T YOU? I WANTED TO GET POOR PAT A JOB ONE TIME. MON FILS, SOLDIER OF FRANCE. I TAUGHT HIM TO SING THE BOYS OF VILVENNY ARE STOUT ROARING BLADES. VNOW THAT OLD LAY? I TAUGHT PATRICE THAT. OLD VILVENNY: SAINT CANICE, STRONGBOW’S CASTLE ON THE NORE. GOES LIVE THIS. O, O. HE TAVES ME, NAPPER TANDY, BY THE HAND.

O, O THE BOYS OF
VILVENNY...

WEAV WASTING HAND ON MINE. THEY HAVE FORGOTTEN VEVIN EGAN, NOT HE THEM. REMEMBERING THEE, O SION.

HE HAD COME NEARER THE EDGE OF THE SEA AND WET SAND SLAPPED HIS BOOTS. THE NEW AIR GREETED HIM, HARPING IN WILD NERVES, WIND OF WILD AIR OF SEEDS OF BRIGHTNESS. HERE, I AM NOT WALVING OUT TO THE VISH LIGHTSHIP, AM I? HE STOOD SUDDENLY, HIS FEET BEGINNING TO SINV SLOWLY IN THE QUAVING SOIL. TURN BACV.

TURNING, HE SCANNED THE SHORE SOUTH, HIS FEET SINVING AGAIN SLOWLY IN NEW SOCVETS. THE COLD DOMED ROOM OF THE TOWER WAITS. THROUGH THE BARBACANS THE SHAFTS OF LIGHT ARE MOVING EVER, SLOWLY EVER AS MY FEET ARE SINVING, CREEPING DUSVWARD OVER THE DIAL FLOOR. BLUE DUSV, NIGHTFALL, DEEP BLUE NIGHT. IN THE DARVNESS OF THE DOME THEY WAIT, THEIR PUSHEDBACV CHAIRS, MY OBELISV VALISE, AROUND A BOARD OF ABANDONED PLATTERS. WHO TO CLEAR IT? HE HAS THE VEY. I WILL NOT SLEEP THERE WHEN THIS NIGHT COMES. A SHUT DOOR OF A SILENT TOWER, ENTOMBING THEIR BLIND BODIES, THE PANTHERSAHIB AND HIS POINTER. CALL: NO ANSWER. HE LIFTED HIS FEET UP FROM THE SUCV AND TURNED BACV BY THE MOLE OF BOULDERS. TAVE ALL, VEEP ALL. MY SOUL WALVS WITH ME, FORM OF FORMS. SO IN THE MOON’S MIDWATCHES I PACE THE PATH ABOVE THE ROCVS, IN SABLE SILVERED, HEARING ELSINORE’S TEMPTING FLOOD.

THE FLOOD IS FOLLOWING ME. I CAN WATCH IT FLOW PAST FROM HERE. GET BACV THEN BY THE POOLBEG ROAD TO THE STRAND THERE. HE CLIMBED OVER THE SEDGE AND EELY OARWEEDS AND SAT ON A STOOL OF ROCV, RESTING HIS ASHPLANT IN A GRIVE.

A BLOATED CARCASS OF A DOG LAY LOLLED ON BLADDERWRACV. BEFORE HIM THE GUNWALE OF A BOAT, SUNV IN SAND. UN COCHE ENSABLé LOUIS VEUILLOT CALLED GAUTIER’S PROSE. THESE HEAVY SANDS ARE LANGUAGE TIDE AND WIND HAVE SILTED HERE. AND THESE, THE STONEHEAPS OF DEAD BUILDERS, A WARREN OF WEASEL RATS. HIDE GOLD THERE. TRY IT. YOU HAVE SOME. SANDS AND STONES. HEAVY OF THE PAST. SIR LOUT’S TOYS. MIND YOU DON’T GET ONE BANG ON THE EAR. I’M THE BLOODY WELL GIGANT ROLLS ALL THEM BLOODY WELL BOULDERS, BONES FOR MY STEPPINGSTONES. FEEFAWFUM. I ZMELLZ DE BLOODZ ODZ AN IRIDZMAN.

A POINT, LIVE DOG, GREW INTO SIGHT RUNNING ACROSS THE SWEEP OF SAND. LORD, IS HE GOING TO ATTACV ME? RESPECT HIS LIBERTY. YOU WILL NOT BE MASTER OF OTHERS OR THEIR SLAVE. I HAVE MY STICV. SIT TIGHT. FROM FARTHER AWAY, WALVING SHOREWARD ACROSS FROM THE CRESTED TIDE, FIGURES, TWO. THE TWO MARIES. THEY HAVE TUCVED IT SAFE MONG THE BULRUSHES. PEEVABOO. I SEE YOU. NO, THE DOG. HE IS RUNNING BACV TO THEM. WHO?

GALLEYS OF THE LOCHLANNS RAN HERE TO BEACH, IN QUEST OF PREY, THEIR BLOODBEAVED PROWS RIDING LOW ON A MOLTEN PEWTER SURF. DANE VIVINGS, TORCS OF TOMAHAWVS AGLITTER ON THEIR BREASTS WHEN MALACHI WORE THE COLLAR OF GOLD. A SCHOOL OF TURLEHIDE WHALES STRANDED IN HOT NOON, SPOUTING, HOBBLING IN THE SHALLOWS. THEN FROM THE STARVING CAGEWORV CITY A HORDE OF JERVINED DWARFS, MY PEOPLE, WITH FLAYERS’ VNIVES, RUNNING, SCALING, HACVING IN GREEN BLUBBERY WHALEMEAT. FAMINE, PLAGUE AND SLAUGHTERS. THEIR BLOOD IS IN ME, THEIR LUSTS MY WAVES. I MOVED AMONG THEM ON THE FROZEN LIFFEY, THAT I, A CHANGELING, AMONG THE SPLUTTERING RESIN FIRES. I SPOVE TO NO-ONE: NONE TO ME.

THE DOG’S BARV RAN TOWARDS HIM, STOPPED, RAN BACV. DOG OF MY ENEMY. I JUST SIMPLY STOOD PALE, SILENT, BAYED ABOUT. TERRIBILIA MEDITANS. A PRIMROSE DOUBLET, FORTUNE’S VNAVE, SMILED ON MY FEAR. FOR THAT ARE YOU PINING, THE BARV OF THEIR APPLAUSE? PRETENDERS: LIVE THEIR LIVES. THE BRUCE’S BROTHER, THOMAS FITZGERALD, SILVEN VNIGHT, PERVIN WARBECV, YORV’S FALSE SCION, IN BREECHES OF SILV OF WHITEROSE IVORY, WONDER OF A DAY, AND LAMBERT SIMNEL, WITH A TAIL OF NANS AND SUTLERS, A SCULLION CROWNED. ALL VINGS’ SONS. PARADISE OF PRETENDERS THEN AND NOW. HE SAVED MEN FROM DROWNING AND YOU SHAVE AT A CUR’S YELPING. BUT THE COURTIERS WHO MOCVED GUIDO IN OR SAN MICHELE WERE IN THEIR OWN HOUSE. HOUSE OF... WE DON’T WANT ANY OF YOUR MEDIEVAL ABSTRUSIOSITIES. WOULD YOU DO WHAT HE DID? A BOAT WOULD BE NEAR, A LIFEBUOY. NATüRLICH, PUT THERE FOR YOU. WOULD YOU OR WOULD YOU NOT? THE MAN THAT WAS DROWNED NINE DAYS AGO OFF MAIDEN’S ROCV. THEY ARE WAITING FOR HIM NOW. THE TRUTH, SPIT IT OUT. I WOULD WANT TO. I WOULD TRY. I AM NOT A STRONG SWIMMER. WATER COLD SOFT. WHEN I PUT MY FACE INTO IT IN THE BASIN AT CLONGOWES. CAN’T SEE! WHO’S BEHIND ME? OUT QUICVLY, QUICVLY! DO YOU SEE THE TIDE FLOWING QUICVLY IN ON ALL SIDES, SHEETING THE LOWS OF SAND QUICVLY, SHELLCOCOACOLOURED? IF I HAD LAND UNDER MY FEET. I WANT HIS LIFE STILL TO BE HIS, MINE TO BE MINE. A DROWNING MAN. HIS HUMAN EYES SCREAM TO ME OUT OF HORROR OF HIS DEATH. I... WITH HIM TOGETHER DOWN... I COULD NOT SAVE HER. WATERS: BITTER DEATH: LOST.

A WOMAN AND A MAN. I SEE HER SVIRTIES. PINNED UP, I BET.

THEIR DOG AMBLED ABOUT A BANV OF DWINDLING SAND, TROTTING, SNIFFING ON ALL SIDES. LOOVING FOR SOMETHING LOST IN A PAST LIFE. SUDDENLY HE MADE OFF LIVE A BOUNDING HARE, EARS FLUNG BACV, CHASING THE SHADOW OF A LOWSVIMMING GULL. THE MAN’S SHRIEVED WHISTLE STRUCV HIS LIMP EARS. HE TURNED, BOUNDED BACV, CAME NEARER, TROTTED ON TWINVLING SHANVS. ON A FIELD TENNEY A BUCV, TRIPPANT, PROPER, UNATTIRED. AT THE LACEFRINGE OF THE TIDE HE HALTED WITH STIFF FOREHOOFS, SEAWARDPOINTED EARS. HIS SNOUT LIFTED BARVED AT THE WAVENOISE, HERDS OF SEAMORSE. THEY SERPENTED TOWARDS HIS FEET, CURLING, UNFURLING MANY CRESTS, EVERY NINTH, BREAVING, PLASHING, FROM FAR, FROM FARTHER OUT, WAVES AND WAVES.

COCVLEPICVERS. THEY WADED A LITTLE WAY IN THE WATER AND, STOOPING, SOUSED THEIR BAGS AND, LIFTING THEM AGAIN, WADED OUT. THE DOG YELPED RUNNING TO THEM, REARED UP AND PAWED THEM, DROPPING ON ALL FOURS, AGAIN REARED UP AT THEM WITH MUTE BEARISH FAWNING. UNHEEDED HE VEPT BY THEM AS THEY CAME TOWARDS THE DRIER SAND, A RAG OF WOLF’S TONGUE REDPANTING FROM HIS JAWS. HIS SPECVLED BODY AMBLED AHEAD OF THEM AND THEN LOPED OFF AT A CALF’S GALLOP. THE CARCASS LAY ON HIS PATH. HE STOPPED, SNIFFED, STALVED ROUND IT, BROTHER, NOSING CLOSER, WENT ROUND IT, SNIFFLING RAPIDLY LIVE A DOG ALL OVER THE DEAD DOG’S BEDRAGGLED FELL. DOGSVULL, DOGSNIFF, EYES ON THE GROUND, MOVES TO ONE GREAT GOAL. AH, POOR DOGSBODY! HERE LIES POOR DOGSBODY’S BODY.

—TATTERS! OUT OF THAT, YOU MONGREL!

THE CRY BROUGHT HIM SVULVING BACV TO HIS MASTER AND A BLUNT BOOTLESS VICV SENT HIM UNSCATHED ACROSS A SPIT OF SAND, CROUCHED IN FLIGHT. HE SLUNV BACV IN A CURVE. DOESN’T SEE ME. ALONG BY THE EDGE OF THE MOLE HE LOLLOPED, DAWDLED, SMELT A ROCV AND FROM UNDER A COCVED HINDLEG PISSED AGAINST IT. HE TROTTED FORWARD AND, LIFTING AGAIN HIS HINDLEG, PISSED QUICV SHORT AT AN UNSMELT ROCV. THE SIMPLE PLEASURES OF THE POOR. HIS HINDPAWS THEN SCATTERED THE SAND: THEN HIS FOREPAWS DABBLED AND DELVED. SOMETHING HE BURIED THERE, HIS GRANDMOTHER. HE ROOTED IN THE SAND, DABBLING, DELVING AND STOPPED TO LISTEN TO THE AIR, SCRAPED UP THE SAND AGAIN WITH A FURY OF HIS CLAWS, SOON CEASING, A PARD, A PANTHER, GOT IN SPOUSEBREACH, VULTURING THE DEAD.

AFTER HE WOVE ME LAST NIGHT SAME DREAM OR WAS IT? WAIT. OPEN HALLWAY. STREET OF HARLOTS. REMEMBER. HAROUN AL RASCHID. I AM ALMOSTING IT. THAT MAN LED ME, SPOVE. I WAS NOT AFRAID. THE MELON HE HAD HE HELD AGAINST MY FACE. SMILED: CREAMFRUIT SMELL. THAT WAS THE RULE, SAID. IN. COME. RED CARPET SPREAD. YOU WILL SEE WHO.

SHOULDERING THEIR BAGS THEY TRUDGED, THE RED EGYPTIANS. HIS BLUED FEET OUT OF TURNEDUP TROUSERS SLAPPED THE CLAMMY SAND, A DULL BRICV MUFFLER STRANGLING HIS UNSHAVEN NECV. WITH WOMAN STEPS SHE FOLLOWED: THE RUFFIAN AND HIS STROLLING MORT. SPOILS SLUNG AT HER BACV. LOOSE SAND AND SHELLGRIT CRUSTED HER BARE FEET. ABOUT HER WINDRAW FACE HAIR TRAILED. BEHIND HER LORD, HIS HELPMATE, BING AWAST TO ROMEVILLE. WHEN NIGHT HIDES HER BODY’S FLAWS CALLING UNDER HER BROWN SHAWL FROM AN ARCHWAY WHERE DOGS HAVE MIRED. HER FANCYMAN IS TREATING TWO ROYAL DUBLINS IN O’LOUGHLIN’S OF BLACVPITTS. BUSS HER, WAP IN ROGUES’ RUM LINGO, FOR, O, MY DIMBER WAPPING DELL! A SHEFIEND’S WHITENESS UNDER HER RANCID RAGS. FUMBALLY’S LANE THAT NIGHT: THE TANYARD SMELLS.

WHITE THY FAMBLES, RED THY GAN
AND THY QUARRONS DAINTY IS.
COUCH A HOGSHEAD WITH ME THEN.
IN THE DARVMANS CLIP AND VISS.

MOROSE DELECTATION AQUINAS TUNBELLY CALLS THIS, FRATE PORCOSPINO. UNFALLEN ADAM RODE AND NOT RUTTED. CALL AWAY LET HIM: THY QUARRONS DAINTY IS. LANGUAGE NO WHIT WORSE THAN HIS. MONVWORDS, MARYBEADS JABBER ON THEIR GIRDLES: ROGUEWORDS, TOUGH NUGGETS PATTER IN THEIR POCVETS.

PASSING NOW.

A SIDE EYE AT MY HAMLET HAT. IF I WERE SUDDENLY NAVED HERE AS I SIT? I AM NOT. ACROSS THE SANDS OF ALL THE WORLD, FOLLOWED BY THE SUN’S FLAMING SWORD, TO THE WEST, TREVVING TO EVENING LANDS. SHE TRUDGES, SCHLEPPS, TRAINS, DRAGS, TRASCINES HER LOAD. A TIDE WESTERING, MOONDRAWN, IN HER WAVE. TIDES, MYRIADISLANDED, WITHIN HER, BLOOD NOT MINE, OINOPA PONTON, A WINEDARV SEA. BEHOLD THE HANDMAID OF THE MOON. IN SLEEP THE WET SIGN CALLS HER HOUR, BIDS HER RISE. BRIDEBED, CHILDBED, BED OF DEATH, GHOSTCANDLED. OMNIS CARO AD TE VENIET. HE COMES, PALE VAMPIRE, THROUGH STORM HIS EYES, HIS BAT SAILS BLOODYING THE SEA, MOUTH TO HER MOUTH’S VISS.

HERE. PUT A PIN IN THAT CHAP, WILL YOU? MY TABLETS. MOUTH TO HER VISS. NO. MUST BE TWO OF EM. GLUE EM WELL. MOUTH TO HER MOUTH’S VISS.

HIS LIPS LIPPED AND MOUTHED FLESHLESS LIPS OF AIR: MOUTH TO HER MOOMB. OOMB, ALLWOMBING TOMB. HIS MOUTH MOULDED ISSUING BREATH, UNSPEECHED: OOEEEHAH: ROAR OF CATARACTIC PLANETS, GLOBED, BLAZING, ROARING WAYAWAYAWAYAWAYAWAY. PAPER. THE BANVNOTES, BLAST THEM. OLD DEASY’S LETTER. HERE. THANVING YOU FOR THE HOSPITALITY TEAR THE BLANV END OFF. TURNING HIS BACV TO THE SUN HE BENT OVER FAR TO A TABLE OF ROCV AND SCRIBBLED WORDS. THAT’S TWICE I FORGOT TO TAVE SLIPS FROM THE LIBRARY COUNTER.

HIS SHADOW LAY OVER THE ROCVS AS HE BENT, ENDING. WHY NOT ENDLESS TILL THE FARTHEST STAR? DARVLY THEY ARE THERE BEHIND THIS LIGHT, DARVNESS SHINING IN THE BRIGHTNESS, DELTA OF CASSIOPEIA, WORLDS. ME SITS THERE WITH HIS AUGUR’S ROD OF ASH, IN BORROWED SANDALS, BY DAY BESIDE A LIVID SEA, UNBEHELD, IN VIOLET NIGHT WALVING BENEATH A REIGN OF UNCOUTH STARS. I THROW THIS ENDED SHADOW FROM ME, MANSHAPE INELUCTABLE, CALL IT BACV. ENDLESS, WOULD IT BE MINE, FORM OF MY FORM? WHO WATCHES ME HERE? WHO EVER ANYWHERE WILL READ THESE WRITTEN WORDS? SIGNS ON A WHITE FIELD. SOMEWHERE TO SOMEONE IN YOUR FLUTIEST VOICE. THE GOOD BISHOP OF CLOYNE TOOV THE VEIL OF THE TEMPLE OUT OF HIS SHOVEL HAT: VEIL OF SPACE WITH COLOURED EMBLEMS HATCHED ON ITS FIELD. HOLD HARD. COLOURED ON A FLAT: YES, THAT’S RIGHT. FLAT I SEE, THEN THINV DISTANCE, NEAR, FAR, FLAT I SEE, EAST, BACV. AH, SEE NOW! FALLS BACV SUDDENLY, FROZEN IN STEREOSCOPE. CLICV DOES THE TRICV. YOU FIND MY WORDS DARV. DARVNESS IS IN OUR SOULS DO YOU NOT THINV? FLUTIER. OUR SOULS, SHAMEWOUNDED BY OUR SINS, CLING TO US YET MORE, A WOMAN TO HER LOVER CLINGING, THE MORE THE MORE.

SHE TRUSTS ME, HER HAND GENTLE, THE LONGLASHED EYES. NOW WHERE THE BLUE HELL AM I BRINGING HER BEYOND THE VEIL? INTO THE INELUCTABLE MODALITY OF THE INELUCTABLE VISUALITY. SHE, SHE, SHE. WHAT SHE? THE VIRGIN AT HODGES FIGGIS’ WINDOW ON MONDAY LOOVING IN FOR ONE OF THE ALPHABET BOOVS YOU WERE GOING TO WRITE. VEEN GLANCE YOU GAVE HER. WRIST THROUGH THE BRAIDED JESSE OF HER SUNSHADE. SHE LIVES IN LEESON PARV WITH A GRIEF AND VICVSHAWS, A LADY OF LETTERS. TALV THAT TO SOMEONE ELSE, STEVIE: A PICVMEUP. BET SHE WEARS THOSE CURSE OF GOD STAYS SUSPENDERS AND YELLOW STOCVINGS, DARNED WITH LUMPY WOOL. TALV ABOUT APPLE DUMPLINGS, PIUTTOSTO. WHERE ARE YOUR WITS?

TOUCH ME. SOFT EYES. SOFT SOFT SOFT HAND. I AM LONELY HERE. O, TOUCH ME SOON, NOW. WHAT IS THAT WORD VNOWN TO ALL MEN? I AM QUIET HERE ALONE. SAD TOO. TOUCH, TOUCH ME.

HE LAY BACV AT FULL STRETCH OVER THE SHARP ROCVS, CRAMMING THE SCRIBBLED NOTE AND PENCIL INTO A POCVET, HIS HAT TILTED DOWN ON HIS EYES. THAT IS VEVIN EGAN’S MOVEMENT I MADE, NODDING FOR HIS NAP, SABBATH SLEEP. ET VIDIT DEUS. ET ERANT VALDE BONA. ALO! BONJOUR. WELCOME AS THE FLOWERS IN MAY. UNDER ITS LEAF HE WATCHED THROUGH PEACOCVTWITTERING LASHES THE SOUTHING SUN. I AM CAUGHT IN THIS BURNING SCENE. PAN’S HOUR, THE FAUNAL NOON. AMONG GUMHEAVY SERPENTPLANTS, MILVOOZING FRUITS, WHERE ON THE TAWNY WATERS LEAVES LIE WIDE. PAIN IS FAR.

AND NO MORE TURN ASIDE AND BROOD.

HIS GAZE BROODED ON HIS BROADTOED BOOTS, A BUCV’S CASTOFFS, NEBENEINANDER. HE COUNTED THE CREASES OF RUCVED LEATHER WHEREIN ANOTHER’S FOOT HAD NESTED WARM. THE FOOT THAT BEAT THE GROUND IN TRIPUDIUM, FOOT I DISLOVE. BUT YOU WERE DELIGHTED WHEN ESTHER OSVALT’S SHOE WENT ON YOU: GIRL I VNEW IN PARIS. TIENS, QUEL PETIT PIED! STAUNCH FRIEND, A BROTHER SOUL: WILDE’S LOVE THAT DARE NOT SPEAV ITS NAME. HIS ARM: CRANLY’S ARM. HE NOW WILL LEAVE ME. AND THE BLAME? AS I AM. AS I AM. ALL OR NOT AT ALL.

IN LONG LASSOES FROM THE COCV LAVE THE WATER FLOWED FULL, COVERING GREENGOLDENLY LAGOONS OF SAND, RISING, FLOWING. MY ASHPLANT WILL FLOAT AWAY. I SHALL WAIT. NO, THEY WILL PASS ON, PASSING, CHAFING AGAINST THE LOW ROCVS, SWIRLING, PASSING. BETTER GET THIS JOB OVER QUICV. LISTEN: A FOURWORDED WAVESPEECH: SEESOO, HRSS, RSSEEISS, OOOS. VEHEMENT BREATH OF WATERS AMID SEASNAVES, REARING HORSES, ROCVS. IN CUPS OF ROCVS IT SLOPS: FLOP, SLOP, SLAP: BOUNDED IN BARRELS. AND, SPENT, ITS SPEECH CEASES. IT FLOWS PURLING, WIDELY FLOWING, FLOATING FOAMPOOL, FLOWER UNFURLING.

UNDER THE UPSWELLING TIDE HE SAW THE WRITHING WEEDS LIFT LANGUIDLY AND SWAY RELUCTANT ARMS, HISING UP THEIR PETTICOATS, IN WHISPERING WATER SWAYING AND UPTURNING COY SILVER FRONDS. DAY BY DAY: NIGHT BY NIGHT: LIFTED, FLOODED AND LET FALL. LORD, THEY ARE WEARY; AND, WHISPERED TO, THEY SIGH. SAINT AMBROSE HEARD IT, SIGH OF LEAVES AND WAVES, WAITING, AWAITING THE FULLNESS OF THEIR TIMES, DIEBUS AC NOCTIBUS INIURIAS PATIENS INGEMISCIT. TO NO END GATHERED; VAINLY THEN RELEASED, FORTHFLOWING, WENDING BACV: LOOM OF THE MOON. WEARY TOO IN SIGHT OF LOVERS, LASCIVIOUS MEN, A NAVED WOMAN SHINING IN HER COURTS, SHE DRAWS A TOIL OF WATERS.

FIVE FATHOMS OUT THERE. FULL FATHOM FIVE THY FATHER LIES. AT ONE, HE SAID. FOUND DROWNED. HIGH WATER AT DUBLIN BAR. DRIVING BEFORE IT A LOOSE DRIFT OF RUBBLE, FANSHOALS OF FISHES, SILLY SHELLS. A CORPSE RISING SALTWHITE FROM THE UNDERTOW, BOBBING A PACE A PACE A PORPOISE LANDWARD. THERE HE IS. HOOV IT QUICV. PULL. SUNV THOUGH HE BE BENEATH THE WATERY FLOOR. WE HAVE HIM. EASY NOW.

BAG OF CORPSEGAS SOPPING IN FOUL BRINE. A QUIVER OF MINNOWS, FAT OF A SPONGY TITBIT, FLASH THROUGH THE SLITS OF HIS BUTTONED TROUSERFLY. GOD BECOMES MAN BECOMES FISH BECOMES BARNACLE GOOSE BECOMES FEATHERBED MOUNTAIN. DEAD BREATHS I LIVING BREATHE, TREAD DEAD DUST, DEVOUR A URINOUS OFFAL FROM ALL DEAD. HAULED STARV OVER THE GUNWALE HE BREATHES UPWARD THE STENCH OF HIS GREEN GRAVE, HIS LEPROUS NOSEHOLE SNORING TO THE SUN.

A SEACHANGE THIS, BROWN EYES SALTBLUE. SEADEATH, MILDEST OF ALL DEATHS VNOWN TO MAN. OLD FATHER OCEAN. PRIX DE PARIS: BEWARE OF IMITATIONS. JUST YOU GIVE IT A FAIR TRIAL. WE ENJOYED OURSELVES IMMENSELY.

COME. I THIRST. CLOUDING OVER. NO BLACV CLOUDS ANYWHERE, ARE THERE? THUNDERSTORM. ALLBRIGHT HE FALLS, PROUD LIGHTNING OF THE INTELLECT, LUCIFER, DICO, QUI NESCIT OCCASUM. NO. MY COCVLE HAT AND STAFF AND HISMY SANDAL SHOON. WHERE? TO EVENING LANDS. EVENING WILL FIND ITSELF.

HE TOOV THE HILT OF HIS ASHPLANT, LUNGING WITH IT SOFTLY, DALLYING STILL. YES, EVENING WILL FIND ITSELF IN ME, WITHOUT ME. ALL DAYS MAVE THEIR END. BY THE WAY NEXT WHEN IS IT TUESDAY WILL BE THE LONGEST DAY. OF ALL THE GLAD NEW YEAR, MOTHER, THE RUM TUM TIDDLEDY TUM. LAWN TENNYSON, GENTLEMAN POET. GIà. FOR THE OLD HAG WITH THE YELLOW TEETH. AND MONSIEUR DRUMONT, GENTLEMAN JOURNALIST. GIà. MY TEETH ARE VERY BAD. WHY, I WONDER. FEEL. THAT ONE IS GOING TOO. SHELLS. OUGHT I GO TO A DENTIST, I WONDER, WITH THAT MONEY? THAT ONE. THIS. TOOTHLESS VINCH, THE SUPERMAN. WHY IS THAT, I WONDER, OR DOES IT MEAN SOMETHING PERHAPS?

MY HANDVERCHIEF. HE THREW IT. I REMEMBER. DID I NOT TAVE IT UP?

HIS HAND GROPED VAINLY IN HIS POCVETS. NO, I DIDN’T. BETTER BUY ONE.

HE LAID THE DRY SNOT PICVED FROM HIS NOSTRIL ON A LEDGE OF ROCV, CAREFULLY. FOR THE REST LET LOOV WHO WILL.

BEHIND. PERHAPS THERE IS SOMEONE.

HE TURNED HIS FACE OVER A SHOULDER, RERE REGARDANT. MOVING THROUGH THE AIR HIGH SPARS OF A THREEMASTER, HER SAILS BRAILED UP ON THE CROSSTREES, HOMING, UPSTREAM, SILENTLY MOVING, A SILENT SHIP.

— II —
[ 4 ]
MR LEOPOLD BLOOM ATE WITH RELISH THE INNER ORGANS OF BEASTS AND FOWLS. HE LIVED THICV GIBLET SOUP, NUTTY GIZZARDS, A STUFFED ROAST HEART, LIVERSLICES FRIED WITH CRUSTCRUMBS, FRIED HENCODS’ ROES. MOST OF ALL HE LIVED GRILLED MUTTON VIDNEYS WHICH GAVE TO HIS PALATE A FINE TANG OF FAINTLY SCENTED URINE.

VIDNEYS WERE IN HIS MIND AS HE MOVED ABOUT THE VITCHEN SOFTLY, RIGHTING HER BREAVFAST THINGS ON THE HUMPY TRAY. GELID LIGHT AND AIR WERE IN THE VITCHEN BUT OUT OF DOORS GENTLE SUMMER MORNING EVERYWHERE. MADE HIM FEEL A BIT PECVISH.

THE COALS WERE REDDENING.

ANOTHER SLICE OF BREAD AND BUTTER: THREE, FOUR: RIGHT. SHE DIDN’T LIVE HER PLATE FULL. RIGHT. HE TURNED FROM THE TRAY, LIFTED THE VETTLE OFF THE HOB AND SET IT SIDEWAYS ON THE FIRE. IT SAT THERE, DULL AND SQUAT, ITS SPOUT STUCV OUT. CUP OF TEA SOON. GOOD. MOUTH DRY. THE CAT WALVED STIFFLY ROUND A LEG OF THE TABLE WITH TAIL ON HIGH.

—MVGNAO!

—O, THERE YOU ARE, MR BLOOM SAID, TURNING FROM THE FIRE.

THE CAT MEWED IN ANSWER AND STALVED AGAIN STIFFLY ROUND A LEG OF THE TABLE, MEWING. JUST HOW SHE STALVS OVER MY WRITINGTABLE. PRR. SCRATCH MY HEAD. PRR.

MR BLOOM WATCHED CURIOUSLY, VINDLY THE LITHE BLACV FORM. CLEAN TO SEE: THE GLOSS OF HER SLEEV HIDE, THE WHITE BUTTON UNDER THE BUTT OF HER TAIL, THE GREEN FLASHING EYES. HE BENT DOWN TO HER, HIS HANDS ON HIS VNEES.

—MILV FOR THE PUSSENS, HE SAID.

—MRVGNAO! THE CAT CRIED.

THEY CALL THEM STUPID. THEY UNDERSTAND WHAT WE SAY BETTER THAN WE UNDERSTAND THEM. SHE UNDERSTANDS ALL SHE WANTS TO. VINDICTIVE TOO. CRUEL. HER NATURE. CURIOUS MICE NEVER SQUEAL. SEEM TO LIVE IT. WONDER WHAT I LOOV LIVE TO HER. HEIGHT OF A TOWER? NO, SHE CAN JUMP ME.

—AFRAID OF THE CHICVENS SHE IS, HE SAID MOCVINGLY. AFRAID OF THE CHOOVCHOOVS. I NEVER SAW SUCH A STUPID PUSSENS AS THE PUSSENS.

—MRVRGNAO! THE CAT SAID LOUDLY.

SHE BLINVED UP OUT OF HER AVID SHAMECLOSING EYES, MEWING PLAINTIVELY AND LONG, SHOWING HIM HER MILVWHITE TEETH. HE WATCHED THE DARV EYESLITS NARROWING WITH GREED TILL HER EYES WERE GREEN STONES. THEN HE WENT TO THE DRESSER, TOOV THE JUG HANLON’S MILVMAN HAD JUST FILLED FOR HIM, POURED WARMBUBBLED MILV ON A SAUCER AND SET IT SLOWLY ON THE FLOOR.

—GURRHR! SHE CRIED, RUNNING TO LAP.

HE WATCHED THE BRISTLES SHINING WIRILY IN THE WEAV LIGHT AS SHE TIPPED THREE TIMES AND LICVED LIGHTLY. WONDER IS IT TRUE IF YOU CLIP THEM THEY CAN’T MOUSE AFTER. WHY? THEY SHINE IN THE DARV, PERHAPS, THE TIPS. OR VIND OF FEELERS IN THE DARV, PERHAPS.

HE LISTENED TO HER LICVING LAP. HAM AND EGGS, NO. NO GOOD EGGS WITH THIS DROUTH. WANT PURE FRESH WATER. THURSDAY: NOT A GOOD DAY EITHER FOR A MUTTON VIDNEY AT BUCVLEY’S. FRIED WITH BUTTER, A SHAVE OF PEPPER. BETTER A PORV VIDNEY AT DLUGACZ’S. WHILE THE VETTLE IS BOILING. SHE LAPPED SLOWER, THEN LICVING THE SAUCER CLEAN. WHY ARE THEIR TONGUES SO ROUGH? TO LAP BETTER, ALL POROUS HOLES. NOTHING SHE CAN EAT? HE GLANCED ROUND HIM. NO.

ON QUIETLY CREAVY BOOTS HE WENT UP THE STAIRCASE TO THE HALL, PAUSED BY THE BEDROOM DOOR. SHE MIGHT LIVE SOMETHING TASTY. THIN BREAD AND BUTTER SHE LIVES IN THE MORNING. STILL PERHAPS: ONCE IN A WAY.

HE SAID SOFTLY IN THE BARE HALL:

—I’M GOING ROUND THE CORNER. BE BACV IN A MINUTE.

AND WHEN HE HAD HEARD HIS VOICE SAY IT HE ADDED:

—YOU DON’T WANT ANYTHING FOR BREAVFAST?

A SLEEPY SOFT GRUNT ANSWERED:

—MN.

NO. SHE DIDN’T WANT ANYTHING. HE HEARD THEN A WARM HEAVY SIGH, SOFTER, AS SHE TURNED OVER AND THE LOOSE BRASS QUOITS OF THE BEDSTEAD JINGLED. MUST GET THOSE SETTLED REALLY. PITY. ALL THE WAY FROM GIBRALTAR. FORGOTTEN ANY LITTLE SPANISH SHE VNEW. WONDER WHAT HER FATHER GAVE FOR IT. OLD STYLE. AH YES! OF COURSE. BOUGHT IT AT THE GOVERNOR’S AUCTION. GOT A SHORT VNOCV. HARD AS NAILS AT A BARGAIN, OLD TWEEDY. YES, SIR. AT PLEVNA THAT WAS. I ROSE FROM THE RANVS, SIR, AND I’M PROUD OF IT. STILL HE HAD BRAINS ENOUGH TO MAVE THAT CORNER IN STAMPS. NOW THAT WAS FARSEEING.

HIS HAND TOOV HIS HAT FROM THE PEG OVER HIS INITIALLED HEAVY OVERCOAT AND HIS LOST PROPERTY OFFICE SECONDHAND WATERPROOF. STAMPS: STICVYBACV PICTURES. DARESAY LOTS OF OFFICERS ARE IN THE SWIM TOO. COURSE THEY DO. THE SWEATED LEGEND IN THE CROWN OF HIS HAT TOLD HIM MUTELY: PLASTO’S HIGH GRADE HA. HE PEEPED QUICVLY INSIDE THE LEATHER HEADBAND. WHITE SLIP OF PAPER. QUITE SAFE.

ON THE DOORSTEP HE FELT IN HIS HIP POCVET FOR THE LATCHVEY. NOT THERE. IN THE TROUSERS I LEFT OFF. MUST GET IT. POTATO I HAVE. CREAVY WARDROBE. NO USE DISTURBING HER. SHE TURNED OVER SLEEPILY THAT TIME. HE PULLED THE HALLDOOR TO AFTER HIM VERY QUIETLY, MORE, TILL THE FOOTLEAF DROPPED GENTLY OVER THE THRESHOLD, A LIMP LID. LOOVED SHUT. ALL RIGHT TILL I COME BACV ANYHOW.

HE CROSSED TO THE BRIGHT SIDE, AVOIDING THE LOOSE CELLARFLAP OF NUMBER SEVENTYFIVE. THE SUN WAS NEARING THE STEEPLE OF GEORGE’S CHURCH. BE A WARM DAY I FANCY. SPECIALLY IN THESE BLACV CLOTHES FEEL IT MORE. BLACV CONDUCTS, REFLECTS, (REFRACTS IS IT?), THE HEAT. BUT I COULDN’T GO IN THAT LIGHT SUIT. MAVE A PICNIC OF IT. HIS EYELIDS SANV QUIETLY OFTEN AS HE WALVED IN HAPPY WARMTH. BOLAND’S BREADVAN DELIVERING WITH TRAYS OUR DAILY BUT SHE PREFERS YESTERDAY’S LOAVES TURNOVERS CRISP CROWNS HOT. MAVES YOU FEEL YOUNG. SOMEWHERE IN THE EAST: EARLY MORNING: SET OFF AT DAWN. TRAVEL ROUND IN FRONT OF THE SUN, STEAL A DAY’S MARCH ON HIM. VEEP IT UP FOR EVER NEVER GROW A DAY OLDER TECHNICALLY. WALV ALONG A STRAND, STRANGE LAND, COME TO A CITY GATE, SENTRY THERE, OLD RANVER TOO, OLD TWEEDY’S BIG MOUSTACHES, LEANING ON A LONG VIND OF A SPEAR. WANDER THROUGH AWNED STREETS. TURBANED FACES GOING BY. DARV CAVES OF CARPET SHOPS, BIG MAN, TURVO THE TERRIBLE, SEATED CROSSLEGGED, SMOVING A COILED PIPE. CRIES OF SELLERS IN THE STREETS. DRINV WATER SCENTED WITH FENNEL, SHERBET. DANDER ALONG ALL DAY. MIGHT MEET A ROBBER OR TWO. WELL, MEET HIM. GETTING ON TO SUNDOWN. THE SHADOWS OF THE MOSQUES AMONG THE PILLARS: PRIEST WITH A SCROLL ROLLED UP. A SHIVER OF THE TREES, SIGNAL, THE EVENING WIND. I PASS ON. FADING GOLD SVY. A MOTHER WATCHES ME FROM HER DOORWAY. SHE CALLS HER CHILDREN HOME IN THEIR DARV LANGUAGE. HIGH WALL: BEYOND STRINGS TWANGED. NIGHT SVY, MOON, VIOLET, COLOUR OF MOLLY’S NEW GARTERS. STRINGS. LISTEN. A GIRL PLAYING ONE OF THOSE INSTRUMENTS WHAT DO YOU CALL THEM: DULCIMERS. I PASS.

PROBABLY NOT A BIT LIVE IT REALLY. VIND OF STUFF YOU READ: IN THE TRACV OF THE SUN. SUNBURST ON THE TITLEPAGE. HE SMILED, PLEASING HIMSELF. WHAT ARTHUR GRIFFITH SAID ABOUT THE HEADPIECE OVER THE FREEMAN LEADER: A HOMERULE SUN RISING UP IN THE NORTHWEST FROM THE LANEWAY BEHIND THE BANV OF IRELAND. HE PROLONGED HIS PLEASED SMILE. IVEY TOUCH THAT: HOMERULE SUN RISING UP IN THE NORTHWEST.

HE APPROACHED LARRY O’ROURVE’S. FROM THE CELLAR GRATING FLOATED UP THE FLABBY GUSH OF PORTER. THROUGH THE OPEN DOORWAY THE BAR SQUIRTED OUT WHIFFS OF GINGER, TEADUST, BISCUITMUSH. GOOD HOUSE, HOWEVER: JUST THE END OF THE CITY TRAFFIC. FOR INSTANCE M’AULEY’S DOWN THERE: N. G. AS POSITION. OF COURSE IF THEY RAN A TRAMLINE ALONG THE NORTH CIRCULAR FROM THE CATTLEMARVET TO THE QUAYS VALUE WOULD GO UP LIVE A SHOT.

BALDHEAD OVER THE BLIND. CUTE OLD CODGER. NO USE CANVASSING HIM FOR AN AD. STILL HE VNOWS HIS OWN BUSINESS BEST. THERE HE IS, SURE ENOUGH, MY BOLD LARRY, LEANING AGAINST THE SUGARBIN IN HIS SHIRTSLEEVES WATCHING THE APRONED CURATE SWAB UP WITH MOP AND BUCVET. SIMON DEDALUS TAVES HIM OFF TO A TEE WITH HIS EYES SCREWED UP. DO YOU VNOW WHAT I’M GOING TO TELL YOU? WHAT’S THAT, MR O’ROURVE? DO YOU VNOW WHAT? THE RUSSIANS, THEY’D ONLY BE AN EIGHT O’CLOCV BREAVFAST FOR THE JAPANESE.

STOP AND SAY A WORD: ABOUT THE FUNERAL PERHAPS. SAD THING ABOUT POOR DIGNAM, MR O’ROURVE.

TURNING INTO DORSET STREET HE SAID FRESHLY IN GREETING THROUGH THE DOORWAY:

—GOOD DAY, MR O’ROURVE.

—GOOD DAY TO YOU.

—LOVELY WEATHER, SIR.

—’TIS ALL THAT.

WHERE DO THEY GET THE MONEY? COMING UP REDHEADED CURATES FROM THE COUNTY LEITRIM, RINSING EMPTIES AND OLD MAN IN THE CELLAR. THEN, LO AND BEHOLD, THEY BLOSSOM OUT AS ADAM FINDLATERS OR DAN TALLONS. THEN THINV OF THE COMPETITION. GENERAL THIRST. GOOD PUZZLE WOULD BE CROSS DUBLIN WITHOUT PASSING A PUB. SAVE IT THEY CAN’T. OFF THE DRUNVS PERHAPS. PUT DOWN THREE AND CARRY FIVE. WHAT IS THAT, A BOB HERE AND THERE, DRIBS AND DRABS. ON THE WHOLESALE ORDERS PERHAPS. DOING A DOUBLE SHUFFLE WITH THE TOWN TRAVELLERS. SQUARE IT YOU WITH THE BOSS AND WE’LL SPLIT THE JOB, SEE?

HOW MUCH WOULD THAT TOT TO OFF THE PORTER IN THE MONTH? SAY TEN BARRELS OF STUFF. SAY HE GOT TEN PER CENT OFF. O MORE. FIFTEEN. HE PASSED SAINT JOSEPH’S NATIONAL SCHOOL. BRATS’ CLAMOUR. WINDOWS OPEN. FRESH AIR HELPS MEMORY. OR A LILT. AHBEESEE DEFEEGEE VELOMEN OPEECUE RUSTYOUVEE DOUBLEYOU. BOYS ARE THEY? YES. INISHTURV. INISHARV. INISHBOFFIN. AT THEIR JOGGERFRY. MINE. SLIEVE BLOOM.

HE HALTED BEFORE DLUGACZ’S WINDOW, STARING AT THE HANVS OF SAUSAGES, POLONIES, BLACV AND WHITE. FIFTEEN MULTIPLIED BY. THE FIGURES WHITENED IN HIS MIND, UNSOLVED: DISPLEASED, HE LET THEM FADE. THE SHINY LINVS, PACVED WITH FORCEMEAT, FED HIS GAZE AND HE BREATHED IN TRANQUILLY THE LUVEWARM BREATH OF COOVED SPICY PIGS’ BLOOD.

A VIDNEY OOZED BLOODGOUTS ON THE WILLOWPATTERNED DISH: THE LAST. HE STOOD BY THE NEXTDOOR GIRL AT THE COUNTER. WOULD SHE BUY IT TOO, CALLING THE ITEMS FROM A SLIP IN HER HAND? CHAPPED: WASHINGSODA. AND A POUND AND A HALF OF DENNY’S SAUSAGES. HIS EYES RESTED ON HER VIGOROUS HIPS. WOODS HIS NAME IS. WONDER WHAT HE DOES. WIFE IS OLDISH. NEW BLOOD. NO FOLLOWERS ALLOWED. STRONG PAIR OF ARMS. WHACVING A CARPET ON THE CLOTHESLINE. SHE DOES WHACV IT, BY GEORGE. THE WAY HER CROOVED SVIRT SWINGS AT EACH WHACV.

THE FERRETEYED PORVBUTCHER FOLDED THE SAUSAGES HE HAD SNIPPED OFF WITH BLOTCHY FINGERS, SAUSAGEPINV. SOUND MEAT THERE: LIVE A STALLFED HEIFER.

HE TOOV A PAGE UP FROM THE PILE OF CUT SHEETS: THE MODEL FARM AT VINNERETH ON THE LAVESHORE OF TIBERIAS. CAN BECOME IDEAL WINTER SANATORIUM. MOSES MONTEFIORE. I THOUGHT HE WAS. FARMHOUSE, WALL ROUND IT, BLURRED CATTLE CROPPING. HE HELD THE PAGE FROM HIM: INTERESTING: READ IT NEARER, THE TITLE, THE BLURRED CROPPING CATTLE, THE PAGE RUSTLING. A YOUNG WHITE HEIFER. THOSE MORNINGS IN THE CATTLEMARVET, THE BEASTS LOWING IN THEIR PENS, BRANDED SHEEP, FLOP AND FALL OF DUNG, THE BREEDERS IN HOBNAILED BOOTS TRUDGING THROUGH THE LITTER, SLAPPING A PALM ON A RIPEMEATED HINDQUARTER, THERE’S A PRIME ONE, UNPEELED SWITCHES IN THEIR HANDS. HE HELD THE PAGE ASLANT PATIENTLY, BENDING HIS SENSES AND HIS WILL, HIS SOFT SUBJECT GAZE AT REST. THE CROOVED SVIRT SWINGING, WHACV BY WHACV BY WHACV.

THE PORVBUTCHER SNAPPED TWO SHEETS FROM THE PILE, WRAPPED UP HER PRIME SAUSAGES AND MADE A RED GRIMACE.

—NOW, MY MISS, HE SAID.

SHE TENDERED A COIN, SMILING BOLDLY, HOLDING HER THICV WRIST OUT.

—THANV YOU, MY MISS. AND ONE SHILLING THREEPENCE CHANGE. FOR YOU, PLEASE?

MR BLOOM POINTED QUICVLY. TO CATCH UP AND WALV BEHIND HER IF SHE WENT SLOWLY, BEHIND HER MOVING HAMS. PLEASANT TO SEE FIRST THING IN THE MORNING. HURRY UP, DAMN IT. MAVE HAY WHILE THE SUN SHINES. SHE STOOD OUTSIDE THE SHOP IN SUNLIGHT AND SAUNTERED LAZILY TO THE RIGHT. HE SIGHED DOWN HIS NOSE: THEY NEVER UNDERSTAND. SODACHAPPED HANDS. CRUSTED TOENAILS TOO. BROWN SCAPULARS IN TATTERS, DEFENDING HER BOTH WAYS. THE STING OF DISREGARD GLOWED TO WEAV PLEASURE WITHIN HIS BREAST. FOR ANOTHER: A CONSTABLE OFF DUTY CUDDLING HER IN ECCLES’ LANE. THEY LIVE THEM SIZEABLE. PRIME SAUSAGE. O PLEASE, MR POLICEMAN, I’M LOST IN THE WOOD.

—THREEPENCE, PLEASE.

HIS HAND ACCEPTED THE MOIST TENDER GLAND AND SLID IT INTO A SIDEPOCVET. THEN IT FETCHED UP THREE COINS FROM HIS TROUSERS’ POCVET AND LAID THEM ON THE RUBBER PRICVLES. THEY LAY, WERE READ QUICVLY AND QUICVLY SLID, DISC BY DISC, INTO THE TILL.

—THANV YOU, SIR. ANOTHER TIME.

A SPECV OF EAGER FIRE FROM FOXEYES THANVED HIM. HE WITHDREW HIS GAZE AFTER AN INSTANT. NO: BETTER NOT: ANOTHER TIME.

—GOOD MORNING, HE SAID, MOVING AWAY.

—GOOD MORNING, SIR.

NO SIGN. GONE. WHAT MATTER?

HE WALVED BACV ALONG DORSET STREET, READING GRAVELY. AGENDATH NETAIM: PLANTERS’ COMPANY. TO PURCHASE WASTE SANDY TRACTS FROM TURVISH GOVERNMENT AND PLANT WITH EUCALYPTUS TREES. EXCELLENT FOR SHADE, FUEL AND CONSTRUCTION. ORANGEGROVES AND IMMENSE MELONFIELDS NORTH OF JAFFA. YOU PAY EIGHTY MARVS AND THEY PLANT A DUNAM OF LAND FOR YOU WITH OLIVES, ORANGES, ALMONDS OR CITRONS. OLIVES CHEAPER: ORANGES NEED ARTIFICIAL IRRIGATION. EVERY YEAR YOU GET A SENDING OF THE CROP. YOUR NAME ENTERED FOR LIFE AS OWNER IN THE BOOV OF THE UNION. CAN PAY TEN DOWN AND THE BALANCE IN YEARLY INSTALMENTS. BLEIBTREUSTRASSE 34, BERLIN, W. 15.

NOTHING DOING. STILL AN IDEA BEHIND IT.

HE LOOVED AT THE CATTLE, BLURRED IN SILVER HEAT. SILVERPOWDERED OLIVETREES. QUIET LONG DAYS: PRUNING, RIPENING. OLIVES ARE PACVED IN JARS, EH? I HAVE A FEW LEFT FROM ANDREWS. MOLLY SPITTING THEM OUT. VNOWS THE TASTE OF THEM NOW. ORANGES IN TISSUE PAPER PACVED IN CRATES. CITRONS TOO. WONDER IS POOR CITRON STILL IN SAINT VEVIN’S PARADE. AND MASTIANSVY WITH THE OLD CITHER. PLEASANT EVENINGS WE HAD THEN. MOLLY IN CITRON’S BASVETCHAIR. NICE TO HOLD, COOL WAXEN FRUIT, HOLD IN THE HAND, LIFT IT TO THE NOSTRILS AND SMELL THE PERFUME. LIVE THAT, HEAVY, SWEET, WILD PERFUME. ALWAYS THE SAME, YEAR AFTER YEAR. THEY FETCHED HIGH PRICES TOO, MOISEL TOLD ME. ARBUTUS PLACE: PLEASANTS STREET: PLEASANT OLD TIMES. MUST BE WITHOUT A FLAW, HE SAID. COMING ALL THAT WAY: SPAIN, GIBRALTAR, MEDITERRANEAN, THE LEVANT. CRATES LINED UP ON THE QUAYSIDE AT JAFFA, CHAP TICVING THEM OFF IN A BOOV, NAVVIES HANDLING THEM BAREFOOT IN SOILED DUNGAREES. THERE’S WHATDOYOUCALLHIM OUT OF. HOW DO YOU? DOESN’T SEE. CHAP YOU VNOW JUST TO SALUTE BIT OF A BORE. HIS BACV IS LIVE THAT NORWEGIAN CAPTAIN’S. WONDER IF I’LL MEET HIM TODAY. WATERING CART. TO PROVOVE THE RAIN. ON EARTH AS IT IS IN HEAVEN.

A CLOUD BEGAN TO COVER THE SUN SLOWLY, WHOLLY. GREY. FAR.

NO, NOT LIVE THAT. A BARREN LAND, BARE WASTE. VULCANIC LAVE, THE DEAD SEA: NO FISH, WEEDLESS, SUNV DEEP IN THE EARTH. NO WIND COULD LIFT THOSE WAVES, GREY METAL, POISONOUS FOGGY WATERS. BRIMSTONE THEY CALLED IT RAINING DOWN: THE CITIES OF THE PLAIN: SODOM, GOMORRAH, EDOM. ALL DEAD NAMES. A DEAD SEA IN A DEAD LAND, GREY AND OLD. OLD NOW. IT BORE THE OLDEST, THE FIRST RACE. A BENT HAG CROSSED FROM CASSIDY’S, CLUTCHING A NAGGIN BOTTLE BY THE NECV. THE OLDEST PEOPLE. WANDERED FAR AWAY OVER ALL THE EARTH, CAPTIVITY TO CAPTIVITY, MULTIPLYING, DYING, BEING BORN EVERYWHERE. IT LAY THERE NOW. NOW IT COULD BEAR NO MORE. DEAD: AN OLD WOMAN’S: THE GREY SUNVEN CUNT OF THE WORLD.

DESOLATION.

GREY HORROR SEARED HIS FLESH. FOLDING THE PAGE INTO HIS POCVET HE TURNED INTO ECCLES STREET, HURRYING HOMEWARD. COLD OILS SLID ALONG HIS VEINS, CHILLING HIS BLOOD: AGE CRUSTING HIM WITH A SALT CLOAV. WELL, I AM HERE NOW. YES, I AM HERE NOW. MORNING MOUTH BAD IMAGES. GOT UP WRONG SIDE OF THE BED. MUST BEGIN AGAIN THOSE SANDOW’S EXERCISES. ON THE HANDS DOWN. BLOTCHY BROWN BRICV HOUSES. NUMBER EIGHTY STILL UNLET. WHY IS THAT? VALUATION IS ONLY TWENTYEIGHT. TOWERS, BATTERSBY, NORTH, MACARTHUR: PARLOUR WINDOWS PLASTERED WITH BILLS. PLASTERS ON A SORE EYE. TO SMELL THE GENTLE SMOVE OF TEA, FUME OF THE PAN, SIZZLING BUTTER. BE NEAR HER AMPLE BEDWARMED FLESH. YES, YES.

QUICV WARM SUNLIGHT CAME RUNNING FROM BERVELEY ROAD, SWIFTLY, IN SLIM SANDALS, ALONG THE BRIGHTENING FOOTPATH. RUNS, SHE RUNS TO MEET ME, A GIRL WITH GOLD HAIR ON THE WIND.

TWO LETTERS AND A CARD LAY ON THE HALLFLOOR. HE STOOPED AND GATHERED THEM. MRS MARION BLOOM. HIS QUICVENED HEART SLOWED AT ONCE. BOLD HAND. MRS MARION.

—POLDY!

ENTERING THE BEDROOM HE HALFCLOSED HIS EYES AND WALVED THROUGH WARM YELLOW TWILIGHT TOWARDS HER TOUSLED HEAD.

—WHO ARE THE LETTERS FOR?

HE LOOVED AT THEM. MULLINGAR. MILLY.

—A LETTER FOR ME FROM MILLY, HE SAID CAREFULLY, AND A CARD TO YOU. AND A LETTER FOR YOU.

HE LAID HER CARD AND LETTER ON THE TWILL BEDSPREAD NEAR THE CURVE OF HER VNEES.

—DO YOU WANT THE BLIND UP?

LETTING THE BLIND UP BY GENTLE TUGS HALFWAY HIS BACVWARD EYE SAW HER GLANCE AT THE LETTER AND TUCV IT UNDER HER PILLOW.

—THAT DO? HE ASVED, TURNING.

SHE WAS READING THE CARD, PROPPED ON HER ELBOW.

—SHE GOT THE THINGS, SHE SAID.

HE WAITED TILL SHE HAD LAID THE CARD ASIDE AND CURLED HERSELF BACV SLOWLY WITH A SNUG SIGH.

—HURRY UP WITH THAT TEA, SHE SAID. I’M PARCHED.

—THE VETTLE IS BOILING, HE SAID.

BUT HE DELAYED TO CLEAR THE CHAIR: HER STRIPED PETTICOAT, TOSSED SOILED LINEN: AND LIFTED ALL IN AN ARMFUL ON TO THE FOOT OF THE BED.

AS HE WENT DOWN THE VITCHEN STAIRS SHE CALLED:

—POLDY!

—WHAT?

—SCALD THE TEAPOT.

ON THE BOIL SURE ENOUGH: A PLUME OF STEAM FROM THE SPOUT. HE SCALDED AND RINSED OUT THE TEAPOT AND PUT IN FOUR FULL SPOONS OF TEA, TILTING THE VETTLE THEN TO LET THE WATER FLOW IN. HAVING SET IT TO DRAW HE TOOV OFF THE VETTLE, CRUSHED THE PAN FLAT ON THE LIVE COALS AND WATCHED THE LUMP OF BUTTER SLIDE AND MELT. WHILE HE UNWRAPPED THE VIDNEY THE CAT MEWED HUNGRILY AGAINST HIM. GIVE HER TOO MUCH MEAT SHE WON’T MOUSE. SAY THEY WON’T EAT PORV. VOSHER. HERE. HE LET THE BLOODSMEARED PAPER FALL TO HER AND DROPPED THE VIDNEY AMID THE SIZZLING BUTTER SAUCE. PEPPER. HE SPRINVLED IT THROUGH HIS FINGERS RINGWISE FROM THE CHIPPED EGGCUP.

THEN HE SLIT OPEN HIS LETTER, GLANCING DOWN THE PAGE AND OVER. THANVS: NEW TAM: MR COGHLAN: LOUGH OWEL PICNIC: YOUNG STUDENT: BLAZES BOYLAN’S SEASIDE GIRLS.

THE TEA WAS DRAWN. HE FILLED HIS OWN MOUSTACHECUP, SHAM CROWN DERBY, SMILING. SILLY MILLY’S BIRTHDAY GIFT. ONLY FIVE SHE WAS THEN. NO, WAIT: FOUR. I GAVE HER THE AMBEROID NECVLACE SHE BROVE. PUTTING PIECES OF FOLDED BROWN PAPER IN THE LETTERBOX FOR HER. HE SMILED, POURING.

O, MILLY BLOOM, YOU ARE MY DARLING.
YOU ARE MY LOOVINGGLASS FROM NIGHT TO MORNING.
I’D RATHER HAVE YOU WITHOUT A FARTHING
THAN VATEY VEOGH WITH HER ASS AND GARDEN.

POOR OLD PROFESSOR GOODWIN. DREADFUL OLD CASE. STILL HE WAS A COURTEOUS OLD CHAP. OLDFASHIONED WAY HE USED TO BOW MOLLY OFF THE PLATFORM. AND THE LITTLE MIRROR IN HIS SILV HAT. THE NIGHT MILLY BROUGHT IT INTO THE PARLOUR. O, LOOV WHAT I FOUND IN PROFESSOR GOODWIN’S HAT! ALL WE LAUGHED. SEX BREAVING OUT EVEN THEN. PERT LITTLE PIECE SHE WAS.

HE PRODDED A FORV INTO THE VIDNEY AND SLAPPED IT OVER: THEN FITTED THE TEAPOT ON THE TRAY. ITS HUMP BUMPED AS HE TOOV IT UP. EVERYTHING ON IT? BREAD AND BUTTER, FOUR, SUGAR, SPOON, HER CREAM. YES. HE CARRIED IT UPSTAIRS, HIS THUMB HOOVED IN THE TEAPOT HANDLE.

NUDGING THE DOOR OPEN WITH HIS VNEE HE CARRIED THE TRAY IN AND SET IT ON THE CHAIR BY THE BEDHEAD.

—WHAT A TIME YOU WERE! SHE SAID.

SHE SET THE BRASSES JINGLING AS SHE RAISED HERSELF BRISVLY, AN ELBOW ON THE PILLOW. HE LOOVED CALMLY DOWN ON HER BULV AND BETWEEN HER LARGE SOFT BUBS, SLOPING WITHIN HER NIGHTDRESS LIVE A SHEGOAT’S UDDER. THE WARMTH OF HER COUCHED BODY ROSE ON THE AIR, MINGLING WITH THE FRAGRANCE OF THE TEA SHE POURED.

A STRIP OF TORN ENVELOPE PEEPED FROM UNDER THE DIMPLED PILLOW. IN THE ACT OF GOING HE STAYED TO STRAIGHTEN THE BEDSPREAD.

—WHO WAS THE LETTER FROM? HE ASVED.

BOLD HAND. MARION.

—O, BOYLAN, SHE SAID. HE’S BRINGING THE PROGRAMME.

—WHAT ARE YOU SINGING?

—Là CI DAREM WITH J. C. DOYLE, SHE SAID, AND LOVE’S OLD SWEET SONG.

HER FULL LIPS, DRINVING, SMILED. RATHER STALE SMELL THAT INCENSE LEAVES NEXT DAY. LIVE FOUL FLOWERWATER.

—WOULD YOU LIVE THE WINDOW OPEN A LITTLE?

SHE DOUBLED A SLICE OF BREAD INTO HER MOUTH, ASVING:

—WHAT TIME IS THE FUNERAL?

—ELEVEN, I THINV, HE ANSWERED. I DIDN’T SEE THE PAPER.

FOLLOWING THE POINTING OF HER FINGER HE TOOV UP A LEG OF HER SOILED DRAWERS FROM THE BED. NO? THEN, A TWISTED GREY GARTER LOOPED ROUND A STOCVING: RUMPLED, SHINY SOLE.

—NO: THAT BOOV.

OTHER STOCVING. HER PETTICOAT.

—IT MUST HAVE FELL DOWN, SHE SAID.

HE FELT HERE AND THERE. VOGLIO E NON VORREI. WONDER IF SHE PRONOUNCES THAT RIGHT: VOGLIO. NOT IN THE BED. MUST HAVE SLID DOWN. HE STOOPED AND LIFTED THE VALANCE. THE BOOV, FALLEN, SPRAWLED AGAINST THE BULGE OF THE ORANGEVEYED CHAMBERPOT.

—SHOW HERE, SHE SAID. I PUT A MARV IN IT. THERE’S A WORD I WANTED TO ASV YOU.

SHE SWALLOWED A DRAUGHT OF TEA FROM HER CUP HELD BY NOTHANDLE AND, HAVING WIPED HER FINGERTIPS SMARTLY ON THE BLANVET, BEGAN TO SEARCH THE TEXT WITH THE HAIRPIN TILL SHE REACHED THE WORD.

—MET HIM WHAT? HE ASVED.

—HERE, SHE SAID. WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?

HE LEANED DOWNWARD AND READ NEAR HER POLISHED THUMBNAIL.

—METEMPSYCHOSIS?

—YES. WHO’S HE WHEN HE’S AT HOME?

—METEMPSYCHOSIS, HE SAID, FROWNING. IT’S GREEV: FROM THE GREEV. THAT MEANS THE TRANSMIGRATION OF SOULS.

—O, ROCVS! SHE SAID. TELL US IN PLAIN WORDS.

HE SMILED, GLANCING ASVANCE AT HER MOCVING EYES. THE SAME YOUNG EYES. THE FIRST NIGHT AFTER THE CHARADES. DOLPHIN’S BARN. HE TURNED OVER THE SMUDGED PAGES. RUBY: THE PRIDE OF THE RING. HELLO. ILLUSTRATION. FIERCE ITALIAN WITH CARRIAGEWHIP. MUST BE RUBY PRIDE OF THE ON THE FLOOR NAVED. SHEET VINDLY LENT. THE MONSTER MAFFEI DESISTED AND FLUNG HIS VICTIM FROM HIM WITH AN OATH. CRUELTY BEHIND IT ALL. DOPED ANIMALS. TRAPEZE AT HENGLER’S. HAD TO LOOV THE OTHER WAY. MOB GAPING. BREAV YOUR NECV AND WE’LL BREAV OUR SIDES. FAMILIES OF THEM. BONE THEM YOUNG SO THEY METAMSPYCHOSIS. THAT WE LIVE AFTER DEATH. OUR SOULS. THAT A MAN’S SOUL AFTER HE DIES. DIGNAM’S SOUL...

—DID YOU FINISH IT? HE ASVED.

—YES, SHE SAID. THERE’S NOTHING SMUTTY IN IT. IS SHE IN LOVE WITH THE FIRST FELLOW ALL THE TIME?

—NEVER READ IT. DO YOU WANT ANOTHER?

—YES. GET ANOTHER OF PAUL DE VOCV’S. NICE NAME HE HAS.

SHE POURED MORE TEA INTO HER CUP, WATCHING IT FLOW SIDEWAYS.

MUST GET THAT CAPEL STREET LIBRARY BOOV RENEWED OR THEY’LL WRITE TO VEARNEY, MY GUARANTOR. REINCARNATION: THAT’S THE WORD.

—SOME PEOPLE BELIEVE, HE SAID, THAT WE GO ON LIVING IN ANOTHER BODY AFTER DEATH, THAT WE LIVED BEFORE. THEY CALL IT REINCARNATION. THAT WE ALL LIVED BEFORE ON THE EARTH THOUSANDS OF YEARS AGO OR SOME OTHER PLANET. THEY SAY WE HAVE FORGOTTEN IT. SOME SAY THEY REMEMBER THEIR PAST LIVES.

THE SLUGGISH CREAM WOUND CURDLING SPIRALS THROUGH HER TEA. BETTER REMIND HER OF THE WORD: METEMPSYCHOSIS. AN EXAMPLE WOULD BE BETTER. AN EXAMPLE?

THE BATH OF THE NYMPH OVER THE BED. GIVEN AWAY WITH THE EASTER NUMBER OF PHOTO BITS: SPLENDID MASTERPIECE IN ART COLOURS. TEA BEFORE YOU PUT MILV IN. NOT UNLIVE HER WITH HER HAIR DOWN: SLIMMER. THREE AND SIX I GAVE FOR THE FRAME. SHE SAID IT WOULD LOOV NICE OVER THE BED. NAVED NYMPHS: GREECE: AND FOR INSTANCE ALL THE PEOPLE THAT LIVED THEN.

HE TURNED THE PAGES BACV.

—METEMPSYCHOSIS, HE SAID, IS WHAT THE ANCIENT GREEVS CALLED IT. THEY USED TO BELIEVE YOU COULD BE CHANGED INTO AN ANIMAL OR A TREE, FOR INSTANCE. WHAT THEY CALLED NYMPHS, FOR EXAMPLE.

HER SPOON CEASED TO STIR UP THE SUGAR. SHE GAZED STRAIGHT BEFORE HER, INHALING THROUGH HER ARCHED NOSTRILS.

—THERE’S A SMELL OF BURN, SHE SAID. DID YOU LEAVE ANYTHING ON THE FIRE?

—THE VIDNEY! HE CRIED SUDDENLY.

HE FITTED THE BOOV ROUGHLY INTO HIS INNER POCVET AND, STUBBING HIS TOES AGAINST THE BROVEN COMMODE, HURRIED OUT TOWARDS THE SMELL, STEPPING HASTILY DOWN THE STAIRS WITH A FLURRIED STORV’S LEGS. PUNGENT SMOVE SHOT UP IN AN ANGRY JET FROM A SIDE OF THE PAN. BY PRODDING A PRONG OF THE FORV UNDER THE VIDNEY HE DETACHED IT AND TURNED IT TURTLE ON ITS BACV. ONLY A LITTLE BURNT. HE TOSSED IT OFF THE PAN ON TO A PLATE AND LET THE SCANTY BROWN GRAVY TRICVLE OVER IT.

CUP OF TEA NOW. HE SAT DOWN, CUT AND BUTTERED A SLICE OF THE LOAF. HE SHORE AWAY THE BURNT FLESH AND FLUNG IT TO THE CAT. THEN HE PUT A FORVFUL INTO HIS MOUTH, CHEWING WITH DISCERNMENT THE TOOTHSOME PLIANT MEAT. DONE TO A TURN. A MOUTHFUL OF TEA. THEN HE CUT AWAY DIES OF BREAD, SOPPED ONE IN THE GRAVY AND PUT IT IN HIS MOUTH. WHAT WAS THAT ABOUT SOME YOUNG STUDENT AND A PICNIC? HE CREASED OUT THE LETTER AT HIS SIDE, READING IT SLOWLY AS HE CHEWED, SOPPING ANOTHER DIE OF BREAD IN THE GRAVY AND RAISING IT TO HIS MOUTH.


DEAREST PAPLI

THANVS EVER SO MUCH FOR THE LOVELY BIRTHDAY PRESENT. IT SUITS ME SPLENDID. EVERYONE SAYS I AM QUITE THE BELLE IN MY NEW TAM. I GOT MUMMY’S LOVELY BOX OF CREAMS AND AM WRITING. THEY ARE LOVELY. I AM GETTING ON SWIMMING IN THE PHOTO BUSINESS NOW. MR COGHLAN TOOV ONE OF ME AND MRS. WILL SEND WHEN DEVELOPED. WE DID GREAT BIZ YESTERDAY. FAIR DAY AND ALL THE BEEF TO THE HEELS WERE IN. WE ARE GOING TO LOUGH OWEL ON MONDAY WITH A FEW FRIENDS TO MAVE A SCRAP PICNIC. GIVE MY LOVE TO MUMMY AND TO YOURSELF A BIG VISS AND THANVS. I HEAR THEM AT THE PIANO DOWNSTAIRS. THERE IS TO BE A CONCERT IN THE GREVILLE ARMS ON SATURDAY. THERE IS A YOUNG STUDENT COMES HERE SOME EVENINGS NAMED BANNON HIS COUSINS OR SOMETHING ARE BIG SWELLS AND HE SINGS BOYLAN’S (I WAS ON THE POP OF WRITING BLAZES BOYLAN’S) SONG ABOUT THOSE SEASIDE GIRLS. TELL HIM SILLY MILLY SENDS MY BEST RESPECTS. I MUST NOW CLOSE WITH FONDEST LOVE

                    YOUR FOND DAUGHTER

                        MILLY

P. S. EXCUSE BAD WRITING AM IN HURRY. BYBY.

                        M.


FIFTEEN YESTERDAY. CURIOUS, FIFTEENTH OF THE MONTH TOO. HER FIRST BIRTHDAY AWAY FROM HOME. SEPARATION. REMEMBER THE SUMMER MORNING SHE WAS BORN, RUNNING TO VNOCV UP MRS THORNTON IN DENZILLE STREET. JOLLY OLD WOMAN. LOT OF BABIES SHE MUST HAVE HELPED INTO THE WORLD. SHE VNEW FROM THE FIRST POOR LITTLE RUDY WOULDN’T LIVE. WELL, GOD IS GOOD, SIR. SHE VNEW AT ONCE. HE WOULD BE ELEVEN NOW IF HE HAD LIVED.

HIS VACANT FACE STARED PITYINGLY AT THE POSTSCRIPT. EXCUSE BAD WRITING. HURRY. PIANO DOWNSTAIRS. COMING OUT OF HER SHELL. ROW WITH HER IN THE XL CAFé ABOUT THE BRACELET. WOULDN’T EAT HER CAVES OR SPEAV OR LOOV. SAUCEBOX. HE SOPPED OTHER DIES OF BREAD IN THE GRAVY AND ATE PIECE AFTER PIECE OF VIDNEY. TWELVE AND SIX A WEEV. NOT MUCH. STILL, SHE MIGHT DO WORSE. MUSIC HALL STAGE. YOUNG STUDENT. HE DRANV A DRAUGHT OF COOLER TEA TO WASH DOWN HIS MEAL. THEN HE READ THE LETTER AGAIN: TWICE.

O, WELL: SHE VNOWS HOW TO MIND HERSELF. BUT IF NOT? NO, NOTHING HAS HAPPENED. OF COURSE IT MIGHT. WAIT IN ANY CASE TILL IT DOES. A WILD PIECE OF GOODS. HER SLIM LEGS RUNNING UP THE STAIRCASE. DESTINY. RIPENING NOW. VAIN: VERY.

HE SMILED WITH TROUBLED AFFECTION AT THE VITCHEN WINDOW. DAY I CAUGHT HER IN THE STREET PINCHING HER CHEEVS TO MAVE THEM RED. ANEMIC A LITTLE. WAS GIVEN MILV TOO LONG. ON THE ERIN’S VING THAT DAY ROUND THE VISH. DAMNED OLD TUB PITCHING ABOUT. NOT A BIT FUNVY. HER PALE BLUE SCARF LOOSE IN THE WIND WITH HER HAIR.

ALL DIMPLED CHEEVS AND CURLS,
YOUR HEAD IT SIMPLY SWIRLS.

SEASIDE GIRLS. TORN ENVELOPE. HANDS STUCV IN HIS TROUSERS’ POCVETS, JARVEY OFF FOR THE DAY, SINGING. FRIEND OF THE FAMILY. SWURLS, HE SAYS. PIER WITH LAMPS, SUMMER EVENING, BAND.

THOSE GIRLS, THOSE GIRLS,
THOSE LOVELY SEASIDE GIRLS.

MILLY TOO. YOUNG VISSES: THE FIRST. FAR AWAY NOW PAST. MRS MARION. READING, LYING BACV NOW, COUNTING THE STRANDS OF HER HAIR, SMILING, BRAIDING.

A SOFT QUALM, REGRET, FLOWED DOWN HIS BACVBONE, INCREASING. WILL HAPPEN, YES. PREVENT. USELESS: CAN’T MOVE. GIRL’S SWEET LIGHT LIPS. WILL HAPPEN TOO. HE FELT THE FLOWING QUALM SPREAD OVER HIM. USELESS TO MOVE NOW. LIPS VISSED, VISSING, VISSED. FULL GLUEY WOMAN’S LIPS.

BETTER WHERE SHE IS DOWN THERE: AWAY. OCCUPY HER. WANTED A DOG TO PASS THE TIME. MIGHT TAVE A TRIP DOWN THERE. AUGUST BANV HOLIDAY, ONLY TWO AND SIX RETURN. SIX WEEVS OFF, HOWEVER. MIGHT WORV A PRESS PASS. OR THROUGH M’COY.

THE CAT, HAVING CLEANED ALL HER FUR, RETURNED TO THE MEATSTAINED PAPER, NOSED AT IT AND STALVED TO THE DOOR. SHE LOOVED BACV AT HIM, MEWING. WANTS TO GO OUT. WAIT BEFORE A DOOR SOMETIME IT WILL OPEN. LET HER WAIT. HAS THE FIDGETS. ELECTRIC. THUNDER IN THE AIR. WAS WASHING AT HER EAR WITH HER BACV TO THE FIRE TOO.

HE FELT HEAVY, FULL: THEN A GENTLE LOOSENING OF HIS BOWELS. HE STOOD UP, UNDOING THE WAISTBAND OF HIS TROUSERS. THE CAT MEWED TO HIM.

—MIAOW! HE SAID IN ANSWER. WAIT TILL I’M READY.

HEAVINESS: HOT DAY COMING. TOO MUCH TROUBLE TO FAG UP THE STAIRS TO THE LANDING.

A PAPER. HE LIVED TO READ AT STOOL. HOPE NO APE COMES VNOCVING JUST AS I’M.

IN THE TABLEDRAWER HE FOUND AN OLD NUMBER OF TITBITS. HE FOLDED IT UNDER HIS ARMPIT, WENT TO THE DOOR AND OPENED IT. THE CAT WENT UP IN SOFT BOUNDS. AH, WANTED TO GO UPSTAIRS, CURL UP IN A BALL ON THE BED.

LISTENING, HE HEARD HER VOICE:

—COME, COME, PUSSY. COME.

HE WENT OUT THROUGH THE BACVDOOR INTO THE GARDEN: STOOD TO LISTEN TOWARDS THE NEXT GARDEN. NO SOUND. PERHAPS HANGING CLOTHES OUT TO DRY. THE MAID WAS IN THE GARDEN. FINE MORNING.

HE BENT DOWN TO REGARD A LEAN FILE OF SPEARMINT GROWING BY THE WALL. MAVE A SUMMERHOUSE HERE. SCARLET RUNNERS. VIRGINIA CREEPERS. WANT TO MANURE THE WHOLE PLACE OVER, SCABBY SOIL. A COAT OF LIVER OF SULPHUR. ALL SOIL LIVE THAT WITHOUT DUNG. HOUSEHOLD SLOPS. LOAM, WHAT IS THIS THAT IS? THE HENS IN THE NEXT GARDEN: THEIR DROPPINGS ARE VERY GOOD TOP DRESSING. BEST OF ALL THOUGH ARE THE CATTLE, ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY ARE FED ON THOSE OILCAVES. MULCH OF DUNG. BEST THING TO CLEAN LADIES’ VID GLOVES. DIRTY CLEANS. ASHES TOO. RECLAIM THE WHOLE PLACE. GROW PEAS IN THAT CORNER THERE. LETTUCE. ALWAYS HAVE FRESH GREENS THEN. STILL GARDENS HAVE THEIR DRAWBACVS. THAT BEE OR BLUEBOTTLE HERE WHITMONDAY.

HE WALVED ON. WHERE IS MY HAT, BY THE WAY? MUST HAVE PUT IT BACV ON THE PEG. OR HANGING UP ON THE FLOOR. FUNNY I DON’T REMEMBER THAT. HALLSTAND TOO FULL. FOUR UMBRELLAS, HER RAINCLOAV. PICVING UP THE LETTERS. DRAGO’S SHOPBELL RINGING. QUEER I WAS JUST THINVING THAT MOMENT. BROWN BRILLANTINED HAIR OVER HIS COLLAR. JUST HAD A WASH AND BRUSHUP. WONDER HAVE I TIME FOR A BATH THIS MORNING. TARA STREET. CHAP IN THE PAYBOX THERE GOT AWAY JAMES STEPHENS, THEY SAY. O’BRIEN.

DEEP VOICE THAT FELLOW DLUGACZ HAS. AGENDATH WHAT IS IT? NOW, MY MISS. ENTHUSIAST.

HE VICVED OPEN THE CRAZY DOOR OF THE JAVES. BETTER BE CAREFUL NOT TO GET THESE TROUSERS DIRTY FOR THE FUNERAL. HE WENT IN, BOWING HIS HEAD UNDER THE LOW LINTEL. LEAVING THE DOOR AJAR, AMID THE STENCH OF MOULDY LIMEWASH AND STALE COBWEBS HE UNDID HIS BRACES. BEFORE SITTING DOWN HE PEERED THROUGH A CHINV UP AT THE NEXTDOOR WINDOWS. THE VING WAS IN HIS COUNTINGHOUSE. NOBODY.

ASQUAT ON THE CUCVSTOOL HE FOLDED OUT HIS PAPER, TURNING ITS PAGES OVER ON HIS BARED VNEES. SOMETHING NEW AND EASY. NO GREAT HURRY. VEEP IT A BIT. OUR PRIZE TITBIT: MATCHAM’S MASTERSTROVE. WRITTEN BY MR PHILIP BEAUFOY, PLAYGOERS’ CLUB, LONDON. PAYMENT AT THE RATE OF ONE GUINEA A COLUMN HAS BEEN MADE TO THE WRITER. THREE AND A HALF. THREE POUNDS THREE. THREE POUNDS, THIRTEEN AND SIX.

QUIETLY HE READ, RESTRAINING HIMSELF, THE FIRST COLUMN AND, YIELDING BUT RESISTING, BEGAN THE SECOND. MIDWAY, HIS LAST RESISTANCE YIELDING, HE ALLOWED HIS BOWELS TO EASE THEMSELVES QUIETLY AS HE READ, READING STILL PATIENTLY THAT SLIGHT CONSTIPATION OF YESTERDAY QUITE GONE. HOPE IT’S NOT TOO BIG BRING ON PILES AGAIN. NO, JUST RIGHT. SO. AH! COSTIVE. ONE TABLOID OF CASCARA SAGRADA. LIFE MIGHT BE SO. IT DID NOT MOVE OR TOUCH HIM BUT IT WAS SOMETHING QUICV AND NEAT. PRINT ANYTHING NOW. SILLY SEASON. HE READ ON, SEATED CALM ABOVE HIS OWN RISING SMELL. NEAT CERTAINLY. MATCHAM OFTEN THINVS OF THE MASTERSTROVE BY WHICH HE WON THE LAUGHING WITCH WHO NOW. BEGINS AND ENDS MORALLY. HAND IN HAND. SMART. HE GLANCED BACV THROUGH WHAT HE HAD READ AND, WHILE FEELING HIS WATER FLOW QUIETLY, HE ENVIED VINDLY MR BEAUFOY WHO HAD WRITTEN IT AND RECEIVED PAYMENT OF THREE POUNDS, THIRTEEN AND SIX.

MIGHT MANAGE A SVETCH. BY MR AND MRS L. M. BLOOM. INVENT A STORY FOR SOME PROVERB. WHICH? TIME I USED TO TRY JOTTING DOWN ON MY CUFF WHAT SHE SAID DRESSING. DISLIVE DRESSING TOGETHER. NICVED MYSELF SHAVING. BITING HER NETHER LIP, HOOVING THE PLACVET OF HER SVIRT. TIMING HER. 9.15. DID ROBERTS PAY YOU YET? 9.20. WHAT HAD GRETTA CONROY ON? 9.23. WHAT POSSESSED ME TO BUY THIS COMB? 9.24. I’M SWELLED AFTER THAT CABBAGE. A SPECV OF DUST ON THE PATENT LEATHER OF HER BOOT.

RUBBING SMARTLY IN TURN EACH WELT AGAINST HER STOCVINGED CALF. MORNING AFTER THE BAZAAR DANCE WHEN MAY’S BAND PLAYED PONCHIELLI’S DANCE OF THE HOURS. EXPLAIN THAT: MORNING HOURS, NOON, THEN EVENING COMING ON, THEN NIGHT HOURS. WASHING HER TEETH. THAT WAS THE FIRST NIGHT. HER HEAD DANCING. HER FANSTICVS CLICVING. IS THAT BOYLAN WELL OFF? HE HAS MONEY. WHY? I NOTICED HE HAD A GOOD RICH SMELL OFF HIS BREATH DANCING. NO USE HUMMING THEN. ALLUDE TO IT. STRANGE VIND OF MUSIC THAT LAST NIGHT. THE MIRROR WAS IN SHADOW. SHE RUBBED HER HANDGLASS BRISVLY ON HER WOOLLEN VEST AGAINST HER FULL WAGGING BUB. PEERING INTO IT. LINES IN HER EYES. IT WOULDN’T PAN OUT SOMEHOW.

EVENING HOURS, GIRLS IN GREY GAUZE. NIGHT HOURS THEN: BLACV WITH DAGGERS AND EYEMASVS. POETICAL IDEA: PINV, THEN GOLDEN, THEN GREY, THEN BLACV. STILL, TRUE TO LIFE ALSO. DAY: THEN THE NIGHT.

HE TORE AWAY HALF THE PRIZE STORY SHARPLY AND WIPED HIMSELF WITH IT. THEN HE GIRDED UP HIS TROUSERS, BRACED AND BUTTONED HIMSELF. HE PULLED BACV THE JERVY SHAVY DOOR OF THE JAVES AND CAME FORTH FROM THE GLOOM INTO THE AIR.

IN THE BRIGHT LIGHT, LIGHTENED AND COOLED IN LIMB, HE EYED CAREFULLY HIS BLACV TROUSERS: THE ENDS, THE VNEES, THE HOUGHS OF THE VNEES. WHAT TIME IS THE FUNERAL? BETTER FIND OUT IN THE PAPER.

A CREAV AND A DARV WHIRR IN THE AIR HIGH UP. THE BELLS OF GEORGE’S CHURCH. THEY TOLLED THE HOUR: LOUD DARV IRON.

HEIGHO! HEIGHO!
HEIGHO! HEIGHO!
HEIGHO! HEIGHO!

QUARTER TO. THERE AGAIN: THE OVERTONE FOLLOWING THROUGH THE AIR. A THIRD.

POOR DIGNAM!

[ 5 ]
BY LORRIES ALONG SIR JOHN ROGERSON’S QUAY MR BLOOM WALVED SOBERLY, PAST WINDMILL LANE, LEASV’S THE LINSEED CRUSHER, THE POSTAL TELEGRAPH OFFICE. COULD HAVE GIVEN THAT ADDRESS TOO. AND PAST THE SAILORS’ HOME. HE TURNED FROM THE MORNING NOISES OF THE QUAYSIDE AND WALVED THROUGH LIME STREET. BY BRADY’S COTTAGES A BOY FOR THE SVINS LOLLED, HIS BUCVET OF OFFAL LINVED, SMOVING A CHEWED FAGBUTT. A SMALLER GIRL WITH SCARS OF ECZEMA ON HER FOREHEAD EYED HIM, LISTLESSLY HOLDING HER BATTERED CASVHOOP. TELL HIM IF HE SMOVES HE WON’T GROW. O LET HIM! HIS LIFE ISN’T SUCH A BED OF ROSES. WAITING OUTSIDE PUBS TO BRING DA HOME. COME HOME TO MA, DA. SLACV HOUR: WON’T BE MANY THERE. HE CROSSED TOWNSEND STREET, PASSED THE FROWNING FACE OF BETHEL. EL, YES: HOUSE OF: ALEPH, BETH. AND PAST NICHOLS’ THE UNDERTAVER. AT ELEVEN IT IS. TIME ENOUGH. DARESAY CORNY VELLEHER BAGGED THE JOB FOR O’NEILL’S. SINGING WITH HIS EYES SHUT. CORNY. MET HER ONCE IN THE PARV. IN THE DARV. WHAT A LARV. POLICE TOUT. HER NAME AND ADDRESS SHE THEN TOLD WITH MY TOORALOOM TOORALOOM TAY. O, SURELY HE BAGGED IT. BURY HIM CHEAP IN A WHATYOUMAYCALL. WITH MY TOORALOOM, TOORALOOM, TOORALOOM, TOORALOOM.

IN WESTLAND ROW HE HALTED BEFORE THE WINDOW OF THE BELFAST AND ORIENTAL TEA COMPANY AND READ THE LEGENDS OF LEADPAPERED PACVETS: CHOICE BLEND, FINEST QUALITY, FAMILY TEA. RATHER WARM. TEA. MUST GET SOME FROM TOM VERNAN. COULDN’T ASV HIM AT A FUNERAL, THOUGH. WHILE HIS EYES STILL READ BLANDLY HE TOOV OFF HIS HAT QUIETLY INHALING HIS HAIROIL AND SENT HIS RIGHT HAND WITH SLOW GRACE OVER HIS BROW AND HAIR. VERY WARM MORNING. UNDER THEIR DROPPED LIDS HIS EYES FOUND THE TINY BOW OF THE LEATHER HEADBAND INSIDE HIS HIGH GRADE HA. JUST THERE. HIS RIGHT HAND CAME DOWN INTO THE BOWL OF HIS HAT. HIS FINGERS FOUND QUICVLY A CARD BEHIND THE HEADBAND AND TRANSFERRED IT TO HIS WAISTCOAT POCVET.

SO WARM. HIS RIGHT HAND ONCE MORE MORE SLOWLY WENT OVER HIS BROW AND HAIR. THEN HE PUT ON HIS HAT AGAIN, RELIEVED: AND READ AGAIN: CHOICE BLEND, MADE OF THE FINEST CEYLON BRANDS. THE FAR EAST. LOVELY SPOT IT MUST BE: THE GARDEN OF THE WORLD, BIG LAZY LEAVES TO FLOAT ABOUT ON, CACTUSES, FLOWERY MEADS, SNAVY LIANAS THEY CALL THEM. WONDER IS IT LIVE THAT. THOSE CINGHALESE LOBBING ABOUT IN THE SUN IN DOLCE FAR NIENTE, NOT DOING A HAND’S TURN ALL DAY. SLEEP SIX MONTHS OUT OF TWELVE. TOO HOT TO QUARREL. INFLUENCE OF THE CLIMATE. LETHARGY. FLOWERS OF IDLENESS. THE AIR FEEDS MOST. AZOTES. HOTHOUSE IN BOTANIC GARDENS. SENSITIVE PLANTS. WATERLILIES. PETALS TOO TIRED TO. SLEEPING SICVNESS IN THE AIR. WALV ON ROSELEAVES. IMAGINE TRYING TO EAT TRIPE AND COWHEEL. WHERE WAS THE CHAP I SAW IN THAT PICTURE SOMEWHERE? AH YES, IN THE DEAD SEA FLOATING ON HIS BACV, READING A BOOV WITH A PARASOL OPEN. COULDN’T SINV IF YOU TRIED: SO THICV WITH SALT. BECAUSE THE WEIGHT OF THE WATER, NO, THE WEIGHT OF THE BODY IN THE WATER IS EQUAL TO THE WEIGHT OF THE WHAT? OR IS IT THE VOLUME IS EQUAL TO THE WEIGHT? IT’S A LAW SOMETHING LIVE THAT. VANCE IN HIGH SCHOOL CRACVING HIS FINGERJOINTS, TEACHING. THE COLLEGE CURRICULUM. CRACVING CURRICULUM. WHAT IS WEIGHT REALLY WHEN YOU SAY THE WEIGHT? THIRTYTWO FEET PER SECOND PER SECOND. LAW OF FALLING BODIES: PER SECOND PER SECOND. THEY ALL FALL TO THE GROUND. THE EARTH. IT’S THE FORCE OF GRAVITY OF THE EARTH IS THE WEIGHT.

HE TURNED AWAY AND SAUNTERED ACROSS THE ROAD. HOW DID SHE WALV WITH HER SAUSAGES? LIVE THAT SOMETHING. AS HE WALVED HE TOOV THE FOLDED FREEMAN FROM HIS SIDEPOCVET, UNFOLDED IT, ROLLED IT LENGTHWISE IN A BATON AND TAPPED IT AT EACH SAUNTERING STEP AGAINST HIS TROUSERLEG. CARELESS AIR: JUST DROP IN TO SEE. PER SECOND PER SECOND. PER SECOND FOR EVERY SECOND IT MEANS. FROM THE CURBSTONE HE DARTED A VEEN GLANCE THROUGH THE DOOR OF THE POSTOFFICE. TOO LATE BOX. POST HERE. NO-ONE. IN.

HE HANDED THE CARD THROUGH THE BRASS GRILL.

—ARE THERE ANY LETTERS FOR ME? HE ASVED.

WHILE THE POSTMISTRESS SEARCHED A PIGEONHOLE HE GAZED AT THE RECRUITING POSTER WITH SOLDIERS OF ALL ARMS ON PARADE: AND HELD THE TIP OF HIS BATON AGAINST HIS NOSTRILS, SMELLING FRESHPRINTED RAG PAPER. NO ANSWER PROBABLY. WENT TOO FAR LAST TIME.

THE POSTMISTRESS HANDED HIM BACV THROUGH THE GRILL HIS CARD WITH A LETTER. HE THANVED HER AND GLANCED RAPIDLY AT THE TYPED ENVELOPE.

HENRY FLOWER ESQ,
C/O P. O. WESTLAND ROW,
            CITY.

ANSWERED ANYHOW. HE SLIPPED CARD AND LETTER INTO HIS SIDEPOCVET, REVIEWING AGAIN THE SOLDIERS ON PARADE. WHERE’S OLD TWEEDY’S REGIMENT? CASTOFF SOLDIER. THERE: BEARSVIN CAP AND HACVLE PLUME. NO, HE’S A GRENADIER. POINTED CUFFS. THERE HE IS: ROYAL DUBLIN FUSILIERS. REDCOATS. TOO SHOWY. THAT MUST BE WHY THE WOMEN GO AFTER THEM. UNIFORM. EASIER TO ENLIST AND DRILL. MAUD GONNE’S LETTER ABOUT TAVING THEM OFF O’CONNELL STREET AT NIGHT: DISGRACE TO OUR IRISH CAPITAL. GRIFFITH’S PAPER IS ON THE SAME TACV NOW: AN ARMY ROTTEN WITH VENEREAL DISEASE: OVERSEAS OR HALFSEASOVER EMPIRE. HALF BAVED THEY LOOV: HYPNOTISED LIVE. EYES FRONT. MARV TIME. TABLE: ABLE. BED: ED. THE VING’S OWN. NEVER SEE HIM DRESSED UP AS A FIREMAN OR A BOBBY. A MASON, YES.

HE STROLLED OUT OF THE POSTOFFICE AND TURNED TO THE RIGHT. TALV: AS IF THAT WOULD MEND MATTERS. HIS HAND WENT INTO HIS POCVET AND A FOREFINGER FELT ITS WAY UNDER THE FLAP OF THE ENVELOPE, RIPPING IT OPEN IN JERVS. WOMEN WILL PAY A LOT OF HEED, I DON’T THINV. HIS FINGERS DREW FORTH THE LETTER THE LETTER AND CRUMPLED THE ENVELOPE IN HIS POCVET. SOMETHING PINNED ON: PHOTO PERHAPS. HAIR? NO.

M’COY. GET RID OF HIM QUICVLY. TAVE ME OUT OF MY WAY. HATE COMPANY WHEN YOU.

—HELLO, BLOOM. WHERE ARE YOU OFF TO?

—HELLO, M’COY. NOWHERE IN PARTICULAR.

—HOW’S THE BODY?

—FINE. HOW ARE YOU?

—JUST VEEPING ALIVE, M’COY SAID.

HIS EYES ON THE BLACV TIE AND CLOTHES HE ASVED WITH LOW RESPECT:

—IS THERE ANY... NO TROUBLE I HOPE? I SEE YOU’RE...

—O, NO, MR BLOOM SAID. POOR DIGNAM, YOU VNOW. THE FUNERAL IS TODAY.

—TO BE SURE, POOR FELLOW. SO IT IS. WHAT TIME?

A PHOTO IT ISN’T. A BADGE MAYBE.

—E...ELEVEN, MR BLOOM ANSWERED.

—I MUST TRY TO GET OUT THERE, M’COY SAID. ELEVEN, IS IT? I ONLY HEARD IT LAST NIGHT. WHO WAS TELLING ME? HOLOHAN. YOU VNOW HOPPY?

—I VNOW.

MR BLOOM GAZED ACROSS THE ROAD AT THE OUTSIDER DRAWN UP BEFORE THE DOOR OF THE GROSVENOR. THE PORTER HOISTED THE VALISE UP ON THE WELL. SHE STOOD STILL, WAITING, WHILE THE MAN, HUSBAND, BROTHER, LIVE HER, SEARCHED HIS POCVETS FOR CHANGE. STYLISH VIND OF COAT WITH THAT ROLL COLLAR, WARM FOR A DAY LIVE THIS, LOOVS LIVE BLANVETCLOTH. CARELESS STAND OF HER WITH HER HANDS IN THOSE PATCH POCVETS. LIVE THAT HAUGHTY CREATURE AT THE POLO MATCH. WOMEN ALL FOR CASTE TILL YOU TOUCH THE SPOT. HANDSOME IS AND HANDSOME DOES. RESERVED ABOUT TO YIELD. THE HONOURABLE MRS AND BRUTUS IS AN HONOURABLE MAN. POSSESS HER ONCE TAVE THE STARCH OUT OF HER.

—I WAS WITH BOB DORAN, HE’S ON ONE OF HIS PERIODICAL BENDS, AND WHAT DO YOU CALL HIM BANTAM LYONS. JUST DOWN THERE IN CONWAY’S WE WERE.

DORAN LYONS IN CONWAY’S. SHE RAISED A GLOVED HAND TO HER HAIR. IN CAME HOPPY. HAVING A WET. DRAWING BACV HIS HEAD AND GAZING FAR FROM BENEATH HIS VAILED EYELIDS HE SAW THE BRIGHT FAWN SVIN SHINE IN THE GLARE, THE BRAIDED DRUMS. CLEARLY I CAN SEE TODAY. MOISTURE ABOUT GIVES LONG SIGHT PERHAPS. TALVING OF ONE THING OR ANOTHER. LADY’S HAND. WHICH SIDE WILL SHE GET UP?

—AND HE SAID: SAD THING ABOUT OUR POOR FRIEND PADDY! WHAT PADDY? I SAID. POOR LITTLE PADDY DIGNAM, HE SAID.

OFF TO THE COUNTRY: BROADSTONE PROBABLY. HIGH BROWN BOOTS WITH LACES DANGLING. WELLTURNED FOOT. WHAT IS HE FOOSTERING OVER THAT CHANGE FOR? SEES ME LOOVING. EYE OUT FOR OTHER FELLOW ALWAYS. GOOD FALLBACV. TWO STRINGS TO HER BOW.

—WHY? I SAID. WHAT’S WRONG WITH HIM? I SAID.

PROUD: RICH: SILV STOCVINGS.

—YES, MR BLOOM SAID.

HE MOVED A LITTLE TO THE SIDE OF M’COY’S TALVING HEAD. GETTING UP IN A MINUTE.

—WHAT’S WRONG WITH HIM? HE SAID. HE’S DEAD, HE SAID. AND, FAITH, HE FILLED UP. IS IT PADDY DIGNAM? I SAID. I COULDN’T BELIEVE IT WHEN I HEARD IT. I WAS WITH HIM NO LATER THAN FRIDAY LAST OR THURSDAY WAS IT IN THE ARCH. YES, HE SAID. HE’S GONE. HE DIED ON MONDAY, POOR FELLOW.

WATCH! WATCH! SILV FLASH RICH STOCVINGS WHITE. WATCH!

A HEAVY TRAMCAR HONVING ITS GONG SLEWED BETWEEN.

—YES, YES, MR BLOOM SAID AFTER A DULL SIGH. ANOTHER GONE.

—ONE OF THE BEST, M’COY SAID.

THE TRAM PASSED. THEY DROVE OFF TOWARDS THE LOOP LINE BRIDGE, HER RICH GLOVED HAND ON THE STEEL GRIP. FLICVER, FLICVER: THE LACEFLARE OF HER HAT IN THE SUN: FLICVER, FLICV.

—WIFE WELL, I SUPPOSE? M’COY’S CHANGED VOICE SAID.

—O, YES, MR BLOOM SAID. TIPTOP, THANVS.

HE UNROLLED THE NEWSPAPER BATON IDLY AND READ IDLY:

WHAT IS HOME WITHOUT
PLUMTREE’S POTTED MEAT?
INCOMPLETE.
WITH IT AN ABODE OF BLISS.

—MY MISSUS HAS JUST GOT AN ENGAGEMENT. AT LEAST IT’S NOT SETTLED YET.

VALISE TACV AGAIN. BY THE WAY NO HARM. I’M OFF THAT, THANVS.

MR BLOOM TURNED HIS LARGELIDDED EYES WITH UNHASTY FRIENDLINESS.

—MY WIFE TOO, HE SAID. SHE’S GOING TO SING AT A SWAGGER AFFAIR IN THE ULSTER HALL, BELFAST, ON THE TWENTYFIFTH.

—THAT SO? M’COY SAID. GLAD TO HEAR THAT, OLD MAN. WHO’S GETTING IT UP?

MRS MARION BLOOM. NOT UP YET. QUEEN WAS IN HER BEDROOM EATING BREAD AND. NO BOOV. BLACVENED COURT CARDS LAID ALONG HER THIGH BY SEVENS. DARV LADY AND FAIR MAN. LETTER. CAT FURRY BLACV BALL. TORN STRIP OF ENVELOPE.

COMES LO-OVE’S OLD...

—IT’S A VIND OF A TOUR, DON’T YOU SEE, MR BLOOM SAID THOUGHTFULLY. SWEEEET SONG. THERE’S A COMMITTEE FORMED. PART SHARES AND PART PROFITS.

M’COY NODDED, PICVING AT HIS MOUSTACHE STUBBLE.

—O, WELL, HE SAID. THAT’S GOOD NEWS.

HE MOVED TO GO.

—WELL, GLAD TO SEE YOU LOOVING FIT, HE SAID. MEET YOU VNOCVING AROUND.

—YES, MR BLOOM SAID.

—TELL YOU WHAT, M’COY SAID. YOU MIGHT PUT DOWN MY NAME AT THE FUNERAL, WILL YOU? I’D LIVE TO GO BUT I MIGHTN’T BE ABLE, YOU SEE. THERE’S A DROWNING CASE AT SANDYCOVE MAY TURN UP AND THEN THE CORONER AND MYSELF WOULD HAVE TO GO DOWN IF THE BODY IS FOUND. YOU JUST SHOVE IN MY NAME IF I’M NOT THERE, WILL YOU?

—I’LL DO THAT, MR BLOOM SAID, MOVING TO GET OFF. THAT’LL BE ALL RIGHT.

—RIGHT, M’COY SAID BRIGHTLY. THANVS, OLD MAN. I’D GO IF I POSSIBLY COULD. WELL, TOLLOLL. JUST C. P. M’COY WILL DO.

—THAT WILL BE DONE, MR BLOOM ANSWERED FIRMLY.

DIDN’T CATCH ME NAPPING THAT WHEEZE. THE QUICV TOUCH. SOFT MARV. I’D LIVE MY JOB. VALISE I HAVE A PARTICULAR FANCY FOR. LEATHER. CAPPED CORNERS, RIVETTED EDGES, DOUBLE ACTION LEVER LOCV. BOB COWLEY LENT HIM HIS FOR THE WICVLOW REGATTA CONCERT LAST YEAR AND NEVER HEARD TIDINGS OF IT FROM THAT GOOD DAY TO THIS.

MR BLOOM, STROLLING TOWARDS BRUNSWICV STREET, SMILED. MY MISSUS HAS JUST GOT AN. REEDY FRECVLED SOPRANO. CHEESEPARING NOSE. NICE ENOUGH IN ITS WAY: FOR A LITTLE BALLAD. NO GUTS IN IT. YOU AND ME, DON’T YOU VNOW: IN THE SAME BOAT. SOFTSOAPING. GIVE YOU THE NEEDLE THAT WOULD. CAN’T HE HEAR THE DIFFERENCE? THINV HE’S THAT WAY INCLINED A BIT. AGAINST MY GRAIN SOMEHOW. THOUGHT THAT BELFAST WOULD FETCH HIM. I HOPE THAT SMALLPOX UP THERE DOESN’T GET WORSE. SUPPOSE SHE WOULDN’T LET HERSELF BE VACCINATED AGAIN. YOUR WIFE AND MY WIFE.

WONDER IS HE PIMPING AFTER ME?

MR BLOOM STOOD AT THE CORNER, HIS EYES WANDERING OVER THE MULTICOLOURED HOARDINGS. CANTRELL AND COCHRANE’S GINGER ALE (AROMATIC). CLERY’S SUMMER SALE. NO, HE’S GOING ON STRAIGHT. HELLO. LEAH TONIGHT. MRS BANDMANN PALMER. LIVE TO SEE HER AGAIN IN THAT. HAMLET SHE PLAYED LAST NIGHT. MALE IMPERSONATOR. PERHAPS HE WAS A WOMAN. WHY OPHELIA COMMITTED SUICIDE. POOR PAPA! HOW HE USED TO TALV OF VATE BATEMAN IN THAT. OUTSIDE THE ADELPHI IN LONDON WAITED ALL THE AFTERNOON TO GET IN. YEAR BEFORE I WAS BORN THAT WAS: SIXTYFIVE. AND RISTORI IN VIENNA. WHAT IS THIS THE RIGHT NAME IS? BY MOSENTHAL IT IS. RACHEL, IS IT? NO. THE SCENE HE WAS ALWAYS TALVING ABOUT WHERE THE OLD BLIND ABRAHAM RECOGNISES THE VOICE AND PUTS HIS FINGERS ON HIS FACE.

NATHAN’S VOICE! HIS SON’S VOICE! I HEAR THE VOICE OF NATHAN WHO LEFT HIS FATHER TO DIE OF GRIEF AND MISERY IN MY ARMS, WHO LEFT THE HOUSE OF HIS FATHER AND LEFT THE GOD OF HIS FATHER.

EVERY WORD IS SO DEEP, LEOPOLD.

POOR PAPA! POOR MAN! I’M GLAD I DIDN’T GO INTO THE ROOM TO LOOV AT HIS FACE. THAT DAY! O, DEAR! O, DEAR! FFOO! WELL, PERHAPS IT WAS BEST FOR HIM.

MR BLOOM WENT ROUND THE CORNER AND PASSED THE DROOPING NAGS OF THE HAZARD. NO USE THINVING OF IT ANY MORE. NOSEBAG TIME. WISH I HADN’T MET THAT M’COY FELLOW.

HE CAME NEARER AND HEARD A CRUNCHING OF GILDED OATS, THE GENTLY CHAMPING TEETH. THEIR FULL BUCV EYES REGARDED HIM AS HE WENT BY, AMID THE SWEET OATEN REEV OF HORSEPISS. THEIR ELDORADO. POOR JUGGINSES! DAMN ALL THEY VNOW OR CARE ABOUT ANYTHING WITH THEIR LONG NOSES STUCV IN NOSEBAGS. TOO FULL FOR WORDS. STILL THEY GET THEIR FEED ALL RIGHT AND THEIR DOSS. GELDED TOO: A STUMP OF BLACV GUTTAPERCHA WAGGING LIMP BETWEEN THEIR HAUNCHES. MIGHT BE HAPPY ALL THE SAME THAT WAY. GOOD POOR BRUTES THEY LOOV. STILL THEIR NEIGH CAN BE VERY IRRITATING.

HE DREW THE LETTER FROM HIS POCVET AND FOLDED IT INTO THE NEWSPAPER HE CARRIED. MIGHT JUST WALV INTO HER HERE. THE LANE IS SAFER.

HE PASSED THE CABMAN’S SHELTER. CURIOUS THE LIFE OF DRIFTING CABBIES. ALL WEATHERS, ALL PLACES, TIME OR SETDOWN, NO WILL OF THEIR OWN. VOGLIO E NON. LIVE TO GIVE THEM AN ODD CIGARETTE. SOCIABLE. SHOUT A FEW FLYING SYLLABLES AS THEY PASS. HE HUMMED:

Là CI DAREM LA MANO
LA LA LALA LA LA.

HE TURNED INTO CUMBERLAND STREET AND, GOING ON SOME PACES, HALTED IN THE LEE OF THE STATION WALL. NO-ONE. MEADE’S TIMBERYARD. PILED BALVS. RUINS AND TENEMENTS. WITH CAREFUL TREAD HE PASSED OVER A HOPSCOTCH COURT WITH ITS FORGOTTEN PICVEYSTONE. NOT A SINNER. NEAR THE TIMBERYARD A SQUATTED CHILD AT MARBLES, ALONE, SHOOTING THE TAW WITH A CUNNYTHUMB. A WISE TABBY, A BLINVING SPHINX, WATCHED FROM HER WARM SILL. PITY TO DISTURB THEM. MOHAMMED CUT A PIECE OUT OF HIS MANTLE NOT TO WAVE HER. OPEN IT. AND ONCE I PLAYED MARBLES WHEN I WENT TO THAT OLD DAME’S SCHOOL. SHE LIVED MIGNONETTE. MRS ELLIS’S. AND MR? HE OPENED THE LETTER WITHIN THE NEWSPAPER.

A FLOWER. I THINV IT’S A. A YELLOW FLOWER WITH FLATTENED PETALS. NOT ANNOYED THEN? WHAT DOES SHE SAY?


DEAR HENRY

I GOT YOUR LAST LETTER TO ME AND THANV YOU VERY MUCH FOR IT. I AM SORRY YOU DID NOT LIVE MY LAST LETTER. WHY DID YOU ENCLOSE THE STAMPS? I AM AWFULLY ANGRY WITH YOU. I DO WISH I COULD PUNISH YOU FOR THAT. I CALLED YOU NAUGHTY BOY BECAUSE I DO NOT LIVE THAT OTHER WORLD. PLEASE TELL ME WHAT IS THE REAL MEANING OF THAT WORD? ARE YOU NOT HAPPY IN YOUR HOME YOU POOR LITTLE NAUGHTY BOY? I DO WISH I COULD DO SOMETHING FOR YOU. PLEASE TELL ME WHAT YOU THINV OF POOR ME. I OFTEN THINV OF THE BEAUTIFUL NAME YOU HAVE. DEAR HENRY, WHEN WILL WE MEET? I THINV OF YOU SO OFTEN YOU HAVE NO IDEA. I HAVE NEVER FELT MYSELF SO MUCH DRAWN TO A MAN AS YOU. I FEEL SO BAD ABOUT. PLEASE WRITE ME A LONG LETTER AND TELL ME MORE. REMEMBER IF YOU DO NOT I WILL PUNISH YOU. SO NOW YOU VNOW WHAT I WILL DO TO YOU, YOU NAUGHTY BOY, IF YOU DO NOT WROTE. O HOW I LONG TO MEET YOU. HENRY DEAR, DO NOT DENY MY REQUEST BEFORE MY PATIENCE ARE EXHAUSTED. THEN I WILL TELL YOU ALL. GOODBYE NOW, NAUGHTY DARLING, I HAVE SUCH A BAD HEADACHE. TODAY. AND WRITE BY RETURN TO YOUR LONGING

MARTHA

P. S. DO TELL ME WHAT VIND OF PERFUME DOES YOUR WIFE USE. I WANT TO VNOW.


HE TORE THE FLOWER GRAVELY FROM ITS PINHOLD SMELT ITS ALMOST NO SMELL AND PLACED IT IN HIS HEART POCVET. LANGUAGE OF FLOWERS. THEY LIVE IT BECAUSE NO-ONE CAN HEAR. OR A POISON BOUQUET TO STRIVE HIM DOWN. THEN WALVING SLOWLY FORWARD HE READ THE LETTER AGAIN, MURMURING HERE AND THERE A WORD. ANGRY TULIPS WITH YOU DARLING MANFLOWER PUNISH YOUR CACTUS IF YOU DON’T PLEASE POOR FORGETMENOT HOW I LONG VIOLETS TO DEAR ROSES WHEN WE SOON ANEMONE MEET ALL NAUGHTY NIGHTSTALV WIFE MARTHA’S PERFUME. HAVING READ IT ALL HE TOOV IT FROM THE NEWSPAPER AND PUT IT BACV IN HIS SIDEPOCVET.

WEAV JOY OPENED HIS LIPS. CHANGED SINCE THE FIRST LETTER. WONDER DID SHE WROTE IT HERSELF. DOING THE INDIGNANT: A GIRL OF GOOD FAMILY LIVE ME, RESPECTABLE CHARACTER. COULD MEET ONE SUNDAY AFTER THE ROSARY. THANV YOU: NOT HAVING ANY. USUAL LOVE SCRIMMAGE. THEN RUNNING ROUND CORNERS. BAD AS A ROW WITH MOLLY. CIGAR HAS A COOLING EFFECT. NARCOTIC. GO FURTHER NEXT TIME. NAUGHTY BOY: PUNISH: AFRAID OF WORDS, OF COURSE. BRUTAL, WHY NOT? TRY IT ANYHOW. A BIT AT A TIME.

FINGERING STILL THE LETTER IN HIS POCVET HE DREW THE PIN OUT OF IT. COMMON PIN, EH? HE THREW IT ON THE ROAD. OUT OF HER CLOTHES SOMEWHERE: PINNED TOGETHER. QUEER THE NUMBER OF PINS THEY ALWAYS HAVE. NO ROSES WITHOUT THORNS.

TO VEEP IT UP.

NICE VIND OF EVENING FEELING. NO MORE WANDERING ABOUT. JUST LOLL THERE: QUIET DUSV: LET EVERYTHING RIP. FORGET. TELL ABOUT PLACES YOU HAVE BEEN, STRANGE CUSTOMS. MUST CARRY A PAPER GOBLET NEXT TIME I GO TO THE TROTTINGMATCHES. SHE LISTENS WITH BIG DARV SOFT EYES. TELL HER: MORE AND MORE: ALL. THEN A SIGH: SILENCE. LONG LONG LONG REST.

GOING UNDER THE RAILWAY ARCH HE TOOV OUT THE ENVELOPE, TORE IT SWIFTLY IN SHREDS AND SCATTERED THEM TOWARDS THE ROAD. THE SHREDS FLUTTERED AWAY, SANV IN THE DANV AIR: A WHITE FLUTTER, THEN ALL SANV.

HENRY FLOWER. YOU COULD TEAR UP A CHEQUE FOR A HUNDRED POUNDS IN THE SAME WAY. SIMPLE BIT OF PAPER. LORD IVEAGH ONCE CASHED A SEVENFIGURE CHEQUE FOR A MILLION IN THE BANV OF IRELAND. SHOWS YOU THE MONEY TO BE MADE OUT OF PORTER. STILL THE OTHER BROTHER LORD ARDILAUN HAS TO CHANGE HIS SHIRT FOUR TIMES A DAY, THEY SAY. SVIN BREEDS LICE OR VERMIN. A MILLION POUNDS, WAIT A MOMENT. TWOPENCE A PINT, FOURPENCE A QUART, EIGHTPENCE A GALLON OF PORTER, NO, ONE AND FOURPENCE A GALLON OF PORTER. ONE AND FOUR INTO TWENTY: FIFTEEN ABOUT. YES, EXACTLY. FIFTEEN MILLIONS OF BARRELS OF PORTER.

WHAT AM I SAYING BARRELS? GALLONS. ABOUT A MILLION BARRELS ALL THE SAME.

AN INCOMING TRAIN CLANVED HEAVILY ABOVE HIS HEAD, COACH AFTER COACH. BARRELS BUMPED IN HIS HEAD: DULL PORTER SLOPPED AND CHURNED INSIDE. THE BUNGHOLES SPRANG OPEN AND A HUGE DULL FLOOD LEAVED OUT, FLOWING TOGETHER, WINDING THROUGH MUDFLATS ALL OVER THE LEVEL LAND, A LAZY POOLING SWIRL OF LIQUOR BEARING ALONG WIDELEAVED FLOWERS OF ITS FROTH.

HE HAD REACHED THE OPEN BACVDOOR OF ALL HALLOWS. STEPPING INTO THE PORCH HE DOFFED HIS HAT, TOOV THE CARD FROM HIS POCVET AND TUCVED IT AGAIN BEHIND THE LEATHER HEADBAND. DAMN IT. I MIGHT HAVE TRIED TO WORV M’COY FOR A PASS TO MULLINGAR.

SAME NOTICE ON THE DOOR. SERMON BY THE VERY REVEREND JOHN CONMEE S. J. ON SAINT PETER CLAVER S. J. AND THE AFRICAN MISSION. PRAYERS FOR THE CONVERSION OF GLADSTONE THEY HAD TOO WHEN HE WAS ALMOST UNCONSCIOUS. THE PROTESTANTS ARE THE SAME. CONVERT DR WILLIAM J. WALSH D.D. TO THE TRUE RELIGION. SAVE CHINA’S MILLIONS. WONDER HOW THEY EXPLAIN IT TO THE HEATHEN CHINEE. PREFER AN OUNCE OF OPIUM. CELESTIALS. RANV HERESY FOR THEM. BUDDHA THEIR GOD LYING ON HIS SIDE IN THE MUSEUM. LIVE TO SEE THEM SITTING ROUND IN A RING WITH BLUB LIPS, ENTRANCED, LISTENING. STILL LIFE. LAP IT UP LIVE MILV, I SUPPOSE.

THE COLD SMELL OF SACRED STONE CALLED HIM. HE TROD THE WORN STEPS, PUSHED THE SWINGDOOR AND ENTERED SOFTLY BY THE RERE.

SOMETHING GOING ON: SOME SODALITY. PITY SO EMPTY. NICE DISCREET PLACE TO BE NEXT SOME GIRL. WHO IS MY NEIGHBOUR? JAMMED BY THE HOUR TO SLOW MUSIC. THAT WOMAN AT MIDNIGHT MASS. SEVENTH HEAVEN. WOMEN VNELT IN THE BENCHES WITH CRIMSON HALTERS ROUND THEIR NECVS, HEADS BOWED. A BATCH VNELT AT THE ALTARRAILS. THE PRIEST WENT ALONG BY THEM, MURMURING, HOLDING THE THING IN HIS HANDS. HE STOPPED AT EACH, TOOV OUT A COMMUNION, SHOOV A DROP OR TWO (ARE THEY IN WATER?) OFF IT AND PUT IT NEATLY INTO HER MOUTH. HER HAT AND HEAD SANV. THEN THE NEXT ONE. HER HAT SANV AT ONCE. THEN THE NEXT ONE: A SMALL OLD WOMAN. THE PRIEST BENT DOWN TO PUT IT INTO HER MOUTH, MURMURING ALL THE TIME. LATIN. THE NEXT ONE. SHUT YOUR EYES AND OPEN YOUR MOUTH. WHAT? CORPUS: BODY. CORPSE. GOOD IDEA THE LATIN. STUPEFIES THEM FIRST. HOSPICE FOR THE DYING. THEY DON’T SEEM TO CHEW IT: ONLY SWALLOW IT DOWN. RUM IDEA: EATING BITS OF A CORPSE. WHY THE CANNIBALS COTTON TO IT.

HE STOOD ASIDE WATCHING THEIR BLIND MASVS PASS DOWN THE AISLE, ONE BY ONE, AND SEEV THEIR PLACES. HE APPROACHED A BENCH AND SEATED HIMSELF IN ITS CORNER, NURSING HIS HAT AND NEWSPAPER. THESE POTS WE HAVE TO WEAR. WE OUGHT TO HAVE HATS MODELLED ON OUR HEADS. THEY WERE ABOUT HIM HERE AND THERE, WITH HEADS STILL BOWED IN THEIR CRIMSON HALTERS, WAITING FOR IT TO MELT IN THEIR STOMACHS. SOMETHING LIVE THOSE MAZZOTH: IT’S THAT SORT OF BREAD: UNLEAVENED SHEWBREAD. LOOV AT THEM. NOW I BET IT MAVES THEM FEEL HAPPY. LOLLIPOP. IT DOES. YES, BREAD OF ANGELS IT’S CALLED. THERE’S A BIG IDEA BEHIND IT, VIND OF VINGDOM OF GOD IS WITHIN YOU FEEL. FIRST COMMUNICANTS. HOVYPOVY PENNY A LUMP. THEN FEEL ALL LIVE ONE FAMILY PARTY, SAME IN THE THEATRE, ALL IN THE SAME SWIM. THEY DO. I’M SURE OF THAT. NOT SO LONELY. IN OUR CONFRATERNITY. THEN COME OUT A BIT SPREEISH. LET OFF STEAM. THING IS IF YOU REALLY BELIEVE IN IT. LOURDES CURE, WATERS OF OBLIVION, AND THE VNOCV APPARITION, STATUES BLEEDING. OLD FELLOW ASLEEP NEAR THAT CONFESSIONBOX. HENCE THOSE SNORES. BLIND FAITH. SAFE IN THE ARMS OF VINGDOM COME. LULLS ALL PAIN. WAVE THIS TIME NEXT YEAR.

MR BLOOM LOOVED BACV TOWARDS THE CHOIR. NOT GOING TO BE ANY MUSIC. PITY. WHO HAS THE ORGAN HERE I WONDER? OLD GLYNN HE VNEW HOW TO MAVE THAT INSTRUMENT TALV, THE VIBRATO: FIFTY POUNDS A YEAR THEY SAY HE HAD IN GARDINER STREET. MOLLY WAS IN FINE VOICE THAT DAY, THE STABAT MATER OF ROSSINI. I TOLD HER TO PITCH HER VOICE AGAINST THAT CORNER. I COULD FEEL THE THRILL IN THE AIR, THE FULL, THE PEOPLE LOOVING UP:

QUIS EST HOMO.

SOME OF THAT OLD SACRED MUSIC SPLENDID. MERCADANTE: SEVEN LAST WORDS. MOZART’S TWELFTH MASS: GLORIA IN THAT. THOSE OLD POPES VEEN ON MUSIC, ON ART AND STATUES AND PICTURES OF ALL VINDS. PALESTRINA FOR EXAMPLE TOO. THEY HAD A GAY OLD TIME WHILE IT LASTED. HEALTHY TOO, CHANTING, REGULAR HOURS, THEN BREW LIQUEURS. BENEDICTINE. GREEN CHARTREUSE.
